source: Clever Girls<tab>The anoles of Naked Rock have ventured forth from their territory to hunt. Eliminate the pack before they begin feeding on the smallfolk!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
森駆けるスプリンター<tab>餓えたアノールの群れが
人を襲うため街道沿いに現れた
アノールを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: One Enchanted Eve<tab>Some foul sorceress has enchanted the forest's funguars, transforming them into man-eating menaces!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
楽しいキノコ狩り<tab>ファンガーの突然変異種が増殖し
周辺地域の生態系を乱している
エンチャンテッド・ファンガーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sprig Cleaning<tab>Ever in search of scrumptious stones, a pack of spriggans has descended into the forest. Join the Wood Wailers to send the scamps back whence they came!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スプリガンのお引っ越し<tab>スプリガンたちが
生息域拡大をもくろみ大移動を開始した
鬼哭隊の衛士と協力し、スプリガンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Something in the Water<tab>Aetherial corruption has rendered one of the forest's water sprites extremely violent. Slay the creature before it harms the smallfolk!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
淀みの奔流「スタグナントスプライト」<tab>エーテルの淀みが
強大なウォータースプライトを生み出した
スタグナントスプライトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Sting<tab>Aggressive hornet swarms nesting near Lilystone are preventing the smallfolk from tending to their daily tasks. Exterminate the pests and bring peace to the area!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
虫刺されにご用心<tab>地元漁師や船頭たちを困らせる
睡蓮岩周辺の魔物を駆除せよ
ホーネット・スウォームを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Asipatra Attacks<tab>Once believed only a creature of legend, the terrible winged Asipatra has been spotted in the Twelveswood. Slay the monster before he can claim any victims.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
人喰いの怪鳥「アシパトラ」<tab>デスゲイズの中でも特に獰猛な個体
通称「アシパトラ」による犠牲者が絶えない
怪鳥アシパトラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Leader of the Pack<tab>A new alpha male has emerged within the local pack of anoles, emboldening the lesser beasts. The leader must be slain before the pack grows even more deadly.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
健脚の暴君「アルファ・アノール」<tab>強力なオスが現れたことで
アノールの群れが攻撃的になっている
群れのボス、アルファ・アノールを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Mother Scorned<tab>After losing several of their hoglets to the Trappers' League, massive wild sows have become overtaken with rage, gouging anything and everything that moves. To ensure the area's safety, the beasts must be put down.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
怒りの猪突猛進<tab>猟師ギルドがホグレットの狩猟を行ったため
怒れる親イノシシが現れた
チャージング・ホッグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Alux of the Draw<tab>A markedly mischievous monster known as Alux has been spotted hiding in Spirithold. Ambush the voidsent, and slay him before he can escape.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
強大なる小鬼「アルシュ」<tab>鬼哭隊を悩ませてきた小鬼「アルシュ」が
ウォーレン牢獄で確認された
この機を逃さず、アルシュを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: エバーシェイドの収穫祭<tab>The Guardian Tree has begun to bear fruit, but it must be gathered quickly before greedy galagos hoard it all.<tab>Deliver the thousand-year plums to the Greatloam Growery botanist before they are further bruised.<tab>Thousand-year plums collected<tab><tab>
target:
エバーシェイドの収穫祭<tab>長老の木が実りの季節を迎えている
熟れた果実を狙うガラゴに注意しつつ
「千年果実」を集めろ<tab>ガラゴたちから守り抜いた
「千年果実」を、「収穫に来た園芸師」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した千年果実<tab><tab>

source: Lethe on My Mind<tab>The Matron's Lethe serves as an important thoroughfare for merchants and travelers, and to ensure they arrive safely at their destinations, the area must be kept clear of deadly predators.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
忘れ得ぬ地神の忘却<tab>地神の忘却は重要な昇降路であり
その安全確保は忘れてはならぬ仕事だ
通行人を脅かす、バザードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Training Day<tab>Assist the new recruit to the Order of the Twin Adder who has found himself outmatched in a training exercise with his commanding officer, Miraudont the Madder.<tab><tab>Serpent recruit<tab><tab>
target:
怒れる教官「激高のミロードン」<tab>双蛇党の模擬戦に巻き込まれた
新兵を守りつつ、協力して
教官である激高のミロードンを倒せ<tab><tab>双蛇党の新兵<tab><tab>

source: Bleeding Green<tab>Help prevent the spread of leafbleed─a sickness causing the death of local foliage─by slaying Matagaigai, an overgrown landtrap known to carry the bane.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
病毒の妖花「マタガイガイ」<tab>黒衣森の動植物に広がる葉血病の
病巣を持つ、巨大妖花を討伐せよ
妖花マタガイガイを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Tastes Like Chick<tab>Several chocobo chicks have escaped from Bentbranch Meadows and now are in danger of being eaten by carnivorous tree slugs. Defeat the slugs before they can fill their bellies!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
チョコチョコチョコチョコボ<tab>牧場からチョコボのヒナたちが脱走した
ヒナたちを逃すため
襲い来るツリースラッグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sleep Tight<tab>Someone or something has awakened souls laid to rest long ago in the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft, and now the restless revenants seek blood!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
あなたの魂に安らぎあれ<tab>何者かがタムタラの墓所に眠る死者を
呼び覚ましたようだ
彷徨える死霊たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Spirithold Run<tab>A cadre of Spirithold-dwelling imps is planning a mass exodus into the Twelveswood to make their merry mischief. Trap them in the abandoned dungeon and see that they never leave.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
大脱走<tab>ウォーレン牢獄を占拠していたインプたちが
集団で逃走しようとしている
出口を固め、インプを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Love Is in the Air<tab>Scores of diremites have crawled from their nest holes and gathered near Galvanth's Spire to search for mates. Join forces with the local Wood Wailer guard and see that the vilekin die spouseless.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ガルヴァンス監視哨の援軍要請<tab>繁殖期を迎え興奮したダイアマイトが
街道沿いに押し寄せてきた
鬼哭隊と協力し、ダイアマイトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: There's Something about Lou<tab>A giant slug known by the playful moniker Lou Carcolh has been seen near the Guardian Tree. Slay the beast before he consumes the sacred monument.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
軟体の大食漢「ル・カルコル」<tab>植物を食い荒らす巨大スラッグが
長老の木周辺で目撃された
聖地を守るため、ル・カルコルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Now I See Bees I Won<tab>Honey-seeking imps are killing off peaceful bees, and if the malevolent monsters are not stopped soon, honey production in the Twelveswood could suffer a serious blow.<tab><tab>Honeybee swarms remaining<tab><tab>
target:
蜂蜜戦争<tab>蜂蜜を狙うインプたちが
邪魔なミツバチたちを攻撃している
ハニービーを守りつつ、インプを倒せ<tab><tab>ハニービー・スウォームの数<tab><tab>

source: Royal Rumble<tab>The Prince of Pestilence has been spotted spreading corruption in the area. Slay His Royal Repugnance.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
悪疫散布器「プリンス・オブ・ペスト」<tab>悪疫をまき散らす妖異が目撃された
伝染病の流行を阻止するため
プリンス・オブ・ペストを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
戦場までは何マルム？<tab>暗黙の境界線をまたぎ
侵入してきた帝国兵を追い散らすのだ
IIIコホルス・ベスティアリウスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
戦場までは何マルム？<tab>暗黙の境界線をまたぎ
侵入してきた帝国兵を追い散らすのだ
IIIコホルス・ベスティアリウスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What a Bee Wants<tab>Tree slugs have descended from their arboreal abodes to feed on the forest's flowers...much to the chagrin of the region's beekeepers, who understand no flowers means no honey.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
秘密の花園<tab>養蜂に欠かせない花を
食い荒すスラッグを排除せよ
大食いのツリースラッグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Stopping the Spread<tab>Swift-breeding, disease-carrying gnats threaten to disrupt the balance of nature in the Twelveswood. Slay the vile voidsent before their numbers multiply.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
繁殖期の終わり<tab>異界からきた蟲型の妖異が
黒衣森で繁殖しつつある
森の秩序を保つため、妖異ナットを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Jack of All Trades<tab>The Jackanapes and his rowdy troop are defiling the forest as they roam in search of new territory. Slay the leader of the pack before he can do any further damage.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
若き魔猿「ジャッカネイプス」<tab>群れを率いた若きボス猿が
新たなナワバリを求めて徘徊している
ジャッカネイプスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
リトルブリッジの戦い<tab>ラムウの狂信者と化したシルフたちが
ラークスコール方面に押し寄せてきた
吊り橋に陣取り、シルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
リトルブリッジの戦い<tab>ラムウの狂信者と化したシルフたちが
ラークスコール方面に押し寄せてきた
吊り橋に陣取り、シルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Protecting the Patch<tab>Diseased treants were recently seen wandering through the Bramble Patch. Put the poor creatures out of their misery before the infection spreads to the healthy flora.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
狂える守護者たち<tab>茨の森にて、病魔に冒され
我を失ったトレントの姿が目撃された
ディズィーズ・トレントを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Hunted<tab>Sirocco, a giant antelope long sought after by the Trappers' League, has been sighted in the area. Fame and fortune await those who can claim this trophy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
神速の羚羊「シロッコ」<tab>黒衣森のすべての猟師たちが狙う
大物羚羊「シロッコ」が目撃された
この機を逃さず、シロッコを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Eft for Dead<tab>Black efts from the east have begun taking over Rootslake, forcing out other species native to the area. Help cull their population before it's too late.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
根を渡って沼地を越えて<tab>他地域に生息していたエフトが
根渡り沼に棲み着こうとしている
押し寄せるブラックエフトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Negotiators<tab>Negotiations between goblin merchants and a gang of local poachers have turned sour. Use this opportunity to teach both bands of outlaws a lesson!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
密猟売買両成敗<tab>密猟品の売買を巡り、密猟者たちと
ゴブリン族たちが乱闘している
不届き者の密猟者たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Breaching the Hive<tab>Infiltrate Redbelly Hive by defeating the gatewatches and opening the gates.<tab><tab>Gates destroyed<tab><tab>
target:
レッドベリー砦の戦い：攻略戦<tab>盗賊団「似我蜂団」の根城
レッドベリー砦を攻略する
門を破壊し、内部へ突入せよ<tab><tab>壊したレッドベリー砦の門扉の数<tab><tab>

source: Clearing the Hive<tab>Make haste to the heart of Redbelly Hive and defeat the bandit leader Severaint Seven Splinter.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
レッドベリー砦の戦い：占領戦<tab>レッドベリー砦の門を突破した
最深部にいる盗賊団「似我蜂団」の首魁
毒針のセヴランを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Defending the Hive<tab>Join forces with the Wood Wailers to defend Redbelly Hive from the bandits who seek to reclaim it.<tab><tab>Gates secured<tab><tab>
target:
レッドベリー砦の戦い：防衛戦<tab>盗賊団「似我蜂団」が
レッドベリー砦を奪還すべく攻めてきた
門を守りつつ、盗賊たちを倒せ<tab><tab>レッドベリー砦の門扉の数<tab><tab>

source: Keeping the Hive<tab>Defend Redbelly Hive while demoralizing the remaining Redbellies by slaying their larceners.<tab><tab>Gates remaining<tab>Redbelly larceners defeated<tab>
target:
レッドベリー砦の戦い：迎撃戦<tab>盗賊団「似我蜂団」から砦を守れ
手練れのレッドベリー・ラーセナーを倒し
戦意を喪失させろ<tab><tab>レッドベリー砦の門扉の数<tab>倒したレッドベリー・ラーセナーの数<tab>

source: Kickin' It with the Kedtraps<tab>The Upper Paths have become tangled with kedtraps. Slice your way through the seedkin before they choke the life from the forest.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
最後の一葉<tab>アッパーパス一帯に蔓延る妖花を刈り
森の調和を保て
繁茂するケッドトラップを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Coeurl King<tab>A band of Miqo'te poachers has begun hunting in the Twelveswood, led by a solitary male who has crowned himself King of the Coeurlclaws. Slay the unholy sovereign and send his subjects scampering.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
秀麗なる無法者「密猟王クァールクロウ」<tab>ムーンキーパー族の密猟団を
率いる男を捕縛せよ
黒衣森を荒らす密猟王クァールクロウを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Another Round<tab>One of Buscarron's Druthers' more unruly patrons─Spenser of the Bottomless Cup─has (once again) had one too many mugs of mead, and begun fighting with another customer. Come and silence the sot.<tab><tab>Conscious customer<tab><tab>
target:
酒房の常連「酔客のスペンサー」<tab>酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」で
酔った冒険者が暴れている
依頼人を守りつつ、酔客のスペンサーを倒せ<tab><tab>困り果てた常連客<tab><tab>

source: Stag Parting<tab>Something has normally placid antelope stags stirred into a frenzy. Put the poor beasts down before they injure themselves or others.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
愛に時間を<tab>繁殖シーズンでもないのに
オスの羚羊が猛っている
混乱を鎮めるためアンテロープ・スタッグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Hide and Seek<tab>The Twelveswood has become a breeding ground for poachers. Slay the lawless fiends, retrieve the hides of their innocent victims, and deliver them to the Wood Wailer.<tab>Deliver the poached hides to the Wood Wailer.<tab>Hides retrieved<tab><tab>
target:
動かぬ証拠<tab>森の調和を乱す密猟者を取り締まれ
密猟者を倒し、証拠品となる
「密猟された皮革」を集めろ<tab>密猟の証拠として確保した
「密猟された皮革」を、「鬼哭隊の隊士」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した密猟された皮革の数<tab><tab>

source: A Tale of Two-tails<tab>The Sixth Astral Era airship landing ruins have been transformed by poachers into a black market. Seek out and slay their ringleader, Yabi Two-tails.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
闇市の元締「双尾のヤビ・カータポ」<tab>密猟品の取引場と目される
飛空艇発着場跡を急襲し、闇市の元締を叩け
双尾のヤビ・カータポを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: To Whom the Toll Goes<tab>Footpads have set up illegal checkpoints along major roadways, and are forcefully collecting coin from any who attempt to pass. Seek out these ne'er-do-wells and show them crime doesn't pay.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
通行料の支払いは刃で<tab>無法者たちが街道をふさぎ
人々に通行料を要求しているらしい
街道を占拠する者たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Eat In, Hide Out<tab>Redbelly bandits have made an abandoned homestead their hideout. Find their camp and slay the entire gang.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
立ち退き要求<tab>盗賊団「似我蜂団」の一味が
主なき庵室を拠点化しようとしている
バリケードを作る盗賊を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Robbin' Goblins<tab>Goblin robbers have attacked a merchant en route to Gridania. Cut down the culprits and reclaim the lost crates!<tab>Return the stolen crates to the crestfallen merchant.<tab>Crates recovered<tab><tab>
target:
失われた品を求めて<tab>ある旅商が、ゴブリン族の追いはぎに
商品を奪われたという
ゴブリン・ロバーを倒し「失われた品」を集めろ<tab>ゴブリン族の追いはぎから奪還した
「失われた品」を、「途方に暮れた商人」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した失われた品の数<tab><tab>

source: ※β1不要：ウォータースプライトの大量発生<tab>※β1不要：<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: ※β1不要：ウォータースプライトの大量発生<tab>※β1不要：<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: No Birds Allowed<tab>Ixali scouts have been spotted near Treespeak. Locate the invaders and drive them from the forest...by any means necessary!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
烏合の衆<tab>イクサル族の哨戒部隊が
ひそひそ木立周辺で確認された
現場に急行し、イクサル族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dschubba Snacks<tab>Every few moons, a miteling hatches that is several times more violent than his brethren. This creature is known by the local smallfolk as Dschubba. Slay the vilekin before it has the chance to reach adulthood.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
赤王の幼生「ジュバ」<tab>周囲の魔物を圧倒する
凶暴なマイトの幼生体が現れた
危険の芽を摘むため、ジュバを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Now Fall<tab>A horde of banemites has been reported migrating towards Fallgourd Float. Slay the vilekin before they can reach the settlement located there.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
フォールゴウドの守り手<tab>フォールゴウドの住民を
脅かす魔物の駆除を行う
押し寄せるベーンマイトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: That Which Binds Us<tab>A local prospector believes that a high mineral content in the stones which make up golems may be what holds the creatures together, and will reward anyone who helps him prove his theory.<tab>Hand the golem fragments over to the shifty-eyed prospector.<tab>Fragments delivered<tab><tab>
target:
山師の願い<tab>新鉱脈を探す山師は
ゴーレムの石材にも興味があるようだ
ストーンゴーレムを倒し、石兵の欠片を集めろ<tab>サンプルとしてゴーレムから回収した
「石兵の欠片」を、「うさんくさい山師」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した石兵の欠片の数<tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
真理は死んだ<tab>霊災前後から出没するようになった
ゴーレムたちを排除せよ
ストーンゴーレムを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
真理は死んだ<tab>霊災前後から出没するようになった
ゴーレムたちを排除せよ
ストーンゴーレムを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Breaking Bud<tab>Troublemaking opo-opos have expanded their territory slightly too close to Blessed Bud. Bloody their noses a bit to ensure they keep their distance.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
猿の惑乱<tab>悪戯者のオポオポの群れが
聖地である精霊の幼木近辺に現れた
群れを追い払うため、オポオポを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Magical Fruit<tab>Opo-opos in search of Mun-Tuy beans have begun raiding Hyrstmill storehouses. Slay the beastkin and prevent any sacks of beans from being stolen.<tab><tab>Sacks remaining<tab><tab>
target:
みんな大好きムントゥイ豆<tab>ムントゥイ豆の味を覚えたオポオポたちが
ハーストミルを狙っている
大切な豆を守るため、オポオポを倒せ<tab><tab>ムントゥイ豆入りの麻袋の数<tab><tab>

source: Micromanaging<tab>Curupira─an especially savage microchu─is on the loose and must be reduced to mulch, lest it be allowed to roam the forest freely, feeding on cuddly woodland creatures and Lalafellin children.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
幻惑の芳香「クルピラ」<tab>人の方向感覚を狂わせる香りを放つ
コチューの突然変異種が確認された
神隠しの元凶、クルピラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Big Issue<tab>A band of Ixali raiders has attacked a Wood Wailer caravan carrying supplies to outlying camps. Drive back the beastmen while ensuring they do not make off with any plunder.<tab><tab>Supplies remaining<tab><tab>
target:
イクサル族強襲部隊の迎撃<tab>イクサル族の強襲部隊によって
鬼哭隊の補給部隊が襲撃された
補給物資を守りつつ、イクサル族を倒せ<tab><tab>鬼哭隊の補給物資の数<tab><tab>

source: It Ziz What It Is<tab>Giant carnivorous scalekin known as ziz have wandered near Fallgourd Float in search of fresh meat. Slay the creatures before anyone becomes supper.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
餓えたるジズが求めるもの<tab>餓えたジズがフォールゴウド周辺を
徘徊しており住民が怯えている
被害が出る前にジズを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Hare Today<tab>Shroud hares are devouring the young trees of Alder Springs. Throw a little salt into their plans before the damage is beyond repair.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
アルダースプリングスの清掃<tab>アルダースプリングスの木々が
アリオンにより食い荒らされている
シュラウドアリオンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Where the Stone Rolls<tab>The masterless golem known as Nunyunuwi must be slain, lest it unwittingly crush some poor passerby.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
孤独なる石兵「ヌニュヌウィ」<tab>鉱脈調査予定地に主を失った
ゴーレムが彷徨い歩いている
孤独なる石兵、ヌニュヌウィを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Attack on Highbridge: Prelude<tab>Qiqirn bandits have launched a surprise assault on Highbridge. Join forces with the remaining Brass Blades and defend the landmark with your lives!<tab><tab>Brass Blades remaining<tab><tab>
target:
ハイブリッジの死闘：前哨戦<tab>キキルン族盗賊団がハイブリッジに迫る
銅刃団の残り兵数に注意しつつ
協力して、キキルン族を倒せ<tab><tab>銅刃団の残り兵数<tab><tab>

source: Attack on Highbridge: Act I<tab>Qiqirn bandits have launched a surprise assault on Highbridge. Fend off the attackers while ensuring the safety of the village residents and their supplies.<tab><tab>Residents remaining<tab>Supplies remaining<tab>
target:
ハイブリッジの死闘：防衛戦<tab>キキルン族盗賊団がハイブリッジに迫る
市民たちと物資を守りつつ
キキルン族を倒せ<tab><tab>市民の残り人数<tab>物資の残り数<tab>

source: Attack on Highbridge: Act II<tab>Qiqirn bandit leader Gilpincher Zuzuroon has joined the fray. Continue your efforts to fend off the attack while protecting the village residents and their supplies.<tab><tab>Residents remaining<tab>Supplies remaining<tab>
target:
ハイブリッジの死闘：ズズルン排撃<tab>キキルン族盗賊団の頭目が現れた
市民たちと物資を守りつつ
守銭奴のズズルンを倒せ<tab><tab>市民の残り人数<tab>物資の残り数<tab>

source: Attack on Highbridge: Act III<tab>It turns out the Qiqirn bandits were hired by the Amalj'aa to kidnap Highbridge residents and deliver them to the Bowl of Embers for tempering. Slay the Amalj'aa leader Nayokk Roh and end this madness.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ハイブリッジの死闘：ナヨク・ロー排撃<tab>キキルン族盗賊団に市民誘拐を
そそのかしたアマルジャ族が現れた
人買のナヨク・ローを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Attack on Highbridge: Denouement<tab>Join the Brass Blades in rescuing the Highbridge residents kidnapped by the Qiqirn bandits and slay the mastermind behind this dark design─Nayokk Roh.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ハイブリッジの死闘：市民奪還作戦<tab>キキルン族に誘拐された市民を
銅刃団と協力しつつ、救出せよ
人買のナヨク・ローを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lady Killer<tab>Ladybugs are more than welcome to dine on the aphids which infest the orchards of the Central Shroud; however, some have acquired a taste for the honeybees who pollinate the crops. See that this meal is their last.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
レディキラー<tab>増えすぎたレディバグが
害虫だけでなく、益虫まで食い荒らしている
押し寄せるレディバグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: My Baby Green<tab>An overgrown tangle of vivified vines lovingly named Jaded Jody is drinking up all the water of Hopeseed Pond. If action is not taken quickly, the whole area will be dry by the next moon.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
水源の破壊者「ジェイデッド・ジョディ」<tab>動植物を潤す水源地、芽吹の池に
水を飲み干そうとする巨大モルボルが現れた
ジェイデッド・ジョディを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ivy League<tab>Some species of ivy will continue growing until they have choked the life out of the entire forest. Assist both the Wood Wailers and the Gods' Quiver in their joint effort to clear the Twelveswood of this menace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ナインティナインアイビー<tab>鬼哭隊と神勇隊に協力し
増殖したツタの化物を駆除せよ
オーバーグロウン・アイビーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Thunderstruck<tab>Sylphs tempered in the levin-light of the primal Ramuh have descended into Little Solace to abduct their untempered brethren. Protect the innocent by delivering lightning-swift justice to the perpetrators.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
シルフと共に去りぬ<tab>ラムウの狂信者と化したシルフが
仮宿のシルフを拉致しようとしている
テンパード・シルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Carrion Baggage<tab>Scraps of food left scattered along forest thoroughfares by goblin travelers are attracting all sorts of carrion-craving cloudkin, who, when the fodder is gone, set their sights on poor Lalafellin pilgrims. Discourage further vultures from frequenting the region by slaying the ones already here.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
禿鷲の饗宴<tab>ゴブリン族が散らかす残飯の影響で
猛禽が街道に現われるようになった
残飯漁りのヴァルチャーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Conspiracy Theory<tab>High-ranking members of the Redbelly Wasps have gathered in an abandoned hovel to discuss their next attack on Gridania's trade routes. See that they do not leave alive.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
飛んで火に入る似我蜂団<tab>盗賊団「似我蜂団」の構成員が

レッドベリー・コンスピレーターを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Waiting for a Moon to Fall<tab>Remnants of Dalamud fallen from the celestial satellite have been reanimated by some sinister force, and now roam the region in the form of powerful golems. Destroy the soulkin before they wreak their havoc on the forest.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
月の反逆者<tab>霊災時に天より降ってきた構造物より
強力なゴーレムが出現した
ルナゴーレムを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What Have You Done for Mead Lately<tab>A divine rite is being planned at the Sanctum of the Twelve and the clergy require copious amounts of freshly brewed mead to...uh, purify their spirits. Escort the porter and see that the mead arrives safely.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
甘い香りの運び人<tab>十二神大聖堂で近く祝い事が催される

十二神大聖堂まで護衛せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lazy for You<tab>The things we love destroy us every time. So it was with Farmer Laurence, who was devoured by his grossly overgrown pet ochu which he named after himself. Slay the rampant creature, that the old farmer's soul might know peace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

妙に肥えたオチューが発見された
レジー・ローレンスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Menuis at Work<tab>The once-gentle aurochs living in the Cookpot have grown bold since the arrival of a bull known as Menuis. Slay the beast and show the other creatures who it is they should truly fear.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
巨躯の猛牛「メヌイス」<tab>クックポットのオーロックスの群れを
その溢れる力によって束ねる
巨躯の猛牛、メヌイスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Overnight Migration<tab>Not only did the Calamity bring with it destruction, pain, and suffering, but it also brought with it mandragoras. Thousands and thousands of mandragoras. Mandragoras who, if not dealt with swiftly and firmly, will continue to multiply until the land is overrun with the creatures.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Go Wespe<tab>The Yellowjackets stationed in middle La Noscea have a royal problem. Wespes so large the smallfolk have dubbed them “kings” are terrorizing the countryside and need to be dethroned immediately.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Mad, Mad, Mad Sergeant<tab>The storm soldiers stationed at the De Nevelle Checkpoint are short a few men, and require volunteers to aid them with their regular training exercises in which they attempt to fend off a mock imperial assault.<tab><tab>Storm recruits remaining<tab><tab>

source: Yellow-bellied Greenbacks<tab>The newest batch of Yellowjacket recruits is softer than a rotten rat corpse, and fights little better. Whip the raw lads into shape. And remember, mercy is the last thing they need.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Boy Who Cried Jackal<tab>A young porter thought it would be clever to fool his companions into believing that they were being stalked by a pack of jackals so while the others were off hunting the beasts, he could slip off and frolic with a local milkmaid. source: Hello, Work<tab>During the Calamity, many bands of pirates lost their ships to either Garlean attackers or the flames of Bahamut. source: One Prince<tab>While little is known about mandragoras, what is known tends to be quite disturbing. Such is the case with the mandragora prince, who is rumored to journey to the sites of slaughters so it might feed off the blood-soaked loam. source: Fight the Flower<tab>They say every rose has its thorn. When it comes to roselings, however, thorns are the least of your problems. source: You Call That a Toad<tab>When the wheat farmers of lower La Noscea were losing large portions of their crops to locusts, they turned to Mealvaan's Gate who introduced Cieldalaes cane toads to the fields to devour the vilekin. Unfortunately, the cane toads, who have no natural predators on Vylbrand, have taken over the region, leaving the farms with no choice but to slay them all.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
蛙の子は蛙<tab>天敵が少ないためか

source: Caving In<tab>The cave bats living in Blind Iron Mines are believed to carry in their bite a sickness which can cause a man to froth at the mouth and lust after the blood of his kin. source: Don't Drink the Water<tab>Despite being surrounded on all sides by the sea, fresh water remains difficult to come by on Vylbrand, which is why the few springs that do exist must be protected at all costs from blighted dodos and jackals who come to the water to drink...and defecate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: (I Just) Died in Six Arms Tonight<tab>It is believed most crabs only live for two to three years─fewer if nearby Lominsans are hungry. There is one crab, however, that is rumored to have survived since the Fifth Astral Era, surviving on the blood of man (though no one can truly back that claim). All things must die, and Old Six-arms's time has come.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Iron Contra Affair<tab>Goblins from Iron Lake, now encamped in Skull Valley, are peddling items strictly prohibited by thalassocratic decree. source: The Last Straw<tab>What nature did not reclaim of Quarterstone after the Calamity, the dodos did, but now it is time to take the land back. Destroy nests and drive the cloudkin from the fields, so that the settlers might piece back together their lives.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: He's Got Legs<tab>Unofficial studies conducted by unauthorized persons claim that more Ul'dahn children are orphaned by bloody attacks on their parents by a terrible creature called Daddy Longlegs than by any other means. In the time you take to question this claim, another child may be orphaned. Are you willing to take that risk!?<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
足長おやじ「ダディーロングレッグ」<tab>隊商や旅人への襲撃を繰り返し
多くの孤児を生み出した忌むべき魔物
ダディーロングレッグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Staying Dead<tab>The restless spirits of fishers lost at sea have wandered back, unable to break their ties with the corporeal world. Purify these poor souls so that they may continue their journey into Thal's realm.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ゴーストバスター<tab>迷信深い船乗りたちが
彷徨う亡霊たちを恐れ、討伐を求めている
デューンボギーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Something to Prove<tab>Ever since being denied entry into the Pugilists', Gladiators', Lancers', Marauders', and Archers' Guilds, Grishild the Ungood has taken to challenging anyone and everyone to duels, hoping to prove her detractors wrong. Or perhaps she's simply a masochist.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
粗野な勝負師「無頼のグリスヒルド」<tab>腕自慢の荒くれ女冒険者が
自分に挑む挑戦者を求めている
無頼のグリスヒルドを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Like an Eft out of Water<tab>Drawn by the sumptuous scent of roasting meat and hot mulled wine, efts have crawled out from the muddy flats of their normal habitat to dine at nearby cookfires. Slay a few so that the kindly father may roast them up for his starveling sons.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
夕飯を渡すな！<tab>冒険者キャンプから発する匂いを嗅ぎつけ
エサを求めるエフトが押し寄せてきた
迫り来るエフトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Wrecked Rats<tab>Cockeyed Qiqirn denied entry to the Coffer & Coffin have not taken the news well and are causing trouble for the heavy who was hired to keep characters like these from causing trouble. Lend the poor lad a hand in helping the beastmen sober up.<tab><tab>Alehouse heavy<tab><tab>
target:
底無の酒豪「飲んべえググルン」<tab>酒房「コッファー＆コフィン」への入店を
断られたキキルン族が暴れ回っている
用心棒を守り、キキルン族を倒せ<tab><tab>コッファー＆コフィンの用心棒<tab><tab>

source: Survivor Rats<tab>A band of Qiqirn bandits has left its camp in search of fresh prey, and the Brass Blades are bent on seeing the beastmen's efforts end in failure. All aid provided by adventurers will be noted and duly rewarded.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
コッファー与えず、コフィンに送れ<tab>キキルン族盗賊団が動き出した
警備中の銅刃団と協力して
キキルン族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Cracked<tab>As his colorful moniker suggests, notorious Qiqirn bandit Babaroon Halfshell prefers his prey firm on the outside and runny on the inside─something to keep in mind when he has you in an iron cookpot, boiling over an open flame. Now get cracking before he grows hungry.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
半熟英雄「半熟のババルン」<tab>絶妙な加減で卵を茹でる腕前によって
一族をまとめあげ盗賊団を築いた
キキルン族の英雄、半熟のババルンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Orobon Part Two: The Spawning<tab>A poor boy whose father was eaten by an orobon (yes, an orobon) has sworn bloody revenge against the terrible wavekin who rendered him a starveling orphan. While it won't bring his father back, the indiscriminate slaying of random orobon may just help restore the sparkle in the young boy's eyes.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
殺人魚スポーニングキラー<tab>釣りに訪れていた父親を
怪魚に食われた少年の怨みをはらせ
スポーニング・オロボンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Let them Eat Cactus<tab>Appalled that the displaced souls living in the shantytowns beneath the towering city walls of Ul'dah are driven to eat rat tails and coblyn legs just to survive, the sultana has ordered her subjects to procure edible cactus leaves and distribute them to the starving masses.<tab>Deliver the leaves to the hungry hobbledehoy.<tab>Leaves delivered<tab><tab>
target:
サボテンサラダ<tab>流民街は慢性的な食糧不足だ
コチニールカクターを倒して食用になる
「サボテンの果肉」を集め、少女に手渡せ<tab>食用になる「サボテンの果肉」を
「腹を減らした少女」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品したサボテンの果肉の数<tab><tab>

source: For the Queen<tab>Giant antling sentries are on the march, most likely in search of Lalafellin children to snatch up and take back to their queen. Slay the vilekin before they catch the scent of a plump, innocent morsel.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
アリだー！<tab>人喰いアリが行軍を開始した
今更、巣穴を塞いでも仕方がない
アントリング・セントリーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Few Arrows Short of a Quiver<tab>The summer home of Eolande Quiveron─former Syndicate member, before tragically losing her life in the Calamity─has been occupied by thieving bandits, one even claiming, in fact, to be the noble lady's heir. Rumor has it the bandits use the run-down manor to hide their booty, and a merchant is seeking aid in recovering his stolen goods.<tab>Return the stolen shipping crates to the crestfallen merchant.<tab>Crates returned<tab><tab>
target:
キヴロン家の住人<tab>元砂蠍衆、故エオランデ・キヴロンの別宅跡を
根城とする盗賊が、商人から荷を奪った
「奪われた荷」を集め、商人に手渡せ<tab>盗賊たちから取り戻した
「奪われた荷」を、「途方に暮れた商人」に

source: Big Time<tab>Fear of being pummeled by sledgehammer beaks is preventing miners from delivering their ore to assayers in Ul'dah. The Brass Blades seek help in clearing the Royal Allagan Starway of any and all threats.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
街道をゆく<tab>採掘された鉱石の輸送ルートを
脅かす魔物を、銅刃団と共に駆逐せよ
スレッジハンマービークを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Cold-blooded<tab>A terrible monster, known as Vodyanoi, living in the pools beneath the Unholy Heir has been seen dragging his victims into the water, where he lies upon them until they asphyxiate. One would think that the wavekin then eats his prey, but such is not the case, as the corpses are left to drift in the pools until they are consumed by jackals and carrion crows. Could it be that Vodyanoi kills merely for pleasure!?<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不浄なる大蝦蟇「ヴォジャノーイ」<tab>アンホーリーエアー付近に潜み
近づく者を水辺へ引きずり込んで貪る
大蝦蟇ヴォジャノーイを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

Give the crafty creature a good cuffing and send him on his way back home.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Men Who See Goats<tab>Packs of wild myotragus have left their mountain homes to forage in the lowlands. The beastkin are known to eat anything and everything, and if not stopped and driven back to the crags, they will more than likely consume what precious little foliage remains in Thanalan.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

街道上に居座って通行を妨害している

<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: License to Quill<tab>Tuco-tuco quills are prized for their durability, and sought by weavers across the realm to use as sewing and knitting needles. The spines of steelquill tuco-tucos, however, are a different story. When shed along the Royal Sunway, they can cause grievous injuries to chocobos and other beasts of burden who use the roads. Slay steelquill tuco-tucos, and keep the thoroughfares clear.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
その硬さ、鋼の如し<tab>鋼のように硬い針を持つ
ツコツコが、街道を穴だらけにしてしまう

source: Westward Bound<tab>An Amalj'aa unit has been sighted moving west, most likely to establish a new encampment closer to Ul'dah. The safety of the city<var 1F /var>state is at stake. Crush the beastmen and send them running back to Zanr'ak.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Bad Camp<tab>The Amalj'aa stationed in their eastern Thanalan encampment have begun preparing for a large-scale foray into Ul'dahn territory. Foil their plans by destroying supply crates and slaying the encampment leader, Glassjaw Nazagg Gah.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Bazaar Blood Triangle<tab>A unit of Amalj'aa raiders has forced its way into the Golden Bazaar in search of slaves and supplies. Aid the Brass Blades stationed in the hamlet in fending off the attackers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Desert Rose<tab>Riding on the dry north winds out of the Black Shroud, kedtrap seeds have taken root in Thanalan. Without any natural predators, the seedkin are free to roam the desert unchecked, consuming everything in their path. source: Almost Paradise<tab>Anyone who has been to Drybone can easily see how the place earned its name. It is an unforgiving place─arid and dry beyond compare. What little water can be found in the area is so prized, men have been known to trade gold just for a sip. This is why the few springs must be protected from those who would foul them─slugs.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

穢れた魔物が湧いてしまった

source: Deep in the Heart of Sagolii<tab>Elder longhorns are extremely territorial and will attack anything which draws too close to their dens. This is fine when those dens are at the top of unscalable peaks, but when they lie within earshot of well-traveled caravan roads, things can become quite hairy. Drive the goats back to the mountains where they belong.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Adventures in Throat Slitting<tab>The leader of the ill-famed Corpse Brigade, Milleuda the Slitter, has finally emerged from hiding to lead her men on a raid into the nearby hills. Use the opportunity to slay the killer and bring an end to her bloody reign.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Corpse Bribe<tab>Once an arm of the proud Ala Mhigan army, the Corpse Brigade has devolved into a band of bandits and petty thieves, albeit well-trained ones. source: Downwind<tab>A pack of violent sandskin peistes has been drawn to Little Ala Mhigo by the stench of the latrine pits which surround the mesa caves the Ala Mhigan refugees call home. source: Return to Cinder<tab>The Zanr'ak altar is used to augur the outcome of future battles between the Amalj'aa and Ul'dah, and it is Cindersoot Pegujj Chah who throws the bones. Slay the mesmerizer and see that his fortune-telling days come to a bloody end.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Fish out of Water<tab>During the Calamity, the land's aetherial balance was disturbed─the result being a myriad of unexplained phenomena which has botanists and naturalists puzzled. What the scholars can agree on, however, is that the balance must be restored, and that means eradicating the problems as they emerge─and anglers in the desert certainly can be classified as one of those problems.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: With One Eye Open<tab>Since the Calamity, the workers of Bluefog have told stories of a terrible one-eyed creature who would come in the night to carry sleeping men away from their campfires, never to be seen again. No one believed them...until a high-ranking Ul'dahn noble was snatched from his caravan. Now the city<var 1F /var>state wants this Arimaspi's blinker on a pike.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

大型妖異、アリマスピを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Under the Nails<tab>Plans to expand the Ceruleum Processing Plant are in motion, with the next step being to clear the nearby land of the massive crystal protrusions known as Dalamud's Talons. To do that, however, the area must first be rid of the hostile basilisks who hunt there.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Boom Goes the Ceruleum<tab>Ceruleum is a highly flammable substance, and even the tiniest of sparks could cause an explosion, which is why the Ceruleum Processing Plant in Bluefog is especially wary of voidsent grenades straying too near the storage and rendering tanks.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
火の用心<tab>青燐精製所には可燃物である「青燐水」が
数多く貯蔵されており、火気は厳禁である
火事の原因になりかねないグレネードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Knock on Steel<tab>The imperial army's mad engineers have developed a new grade of armor plating for their warmachina and are already testing it out on their magitek vanguards. If the Grand Companies of Eorzea are to stand against the Empire, they must know the extent of Garlemald's defenses; thus, they seek adventurers to test their weapons on these mechanical beasts.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
新装甲採用機「魔導ヴァンガード試験型」<tab>帝国軍が新型装甲材を開発したようだ
これを採用した試作機の運用試験を妨害せよ
魔導ヴァンガード試験型を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Poor Maid's Mess<tab>Most likely assuming that there would still be poor maids living there, former-pirates-turned-model-citizens have exchanged their cutlasses for brooms and hammers in an effort to restore Poor Maid's Mill to its former pre-Calamity glory. Aid the men and women in clearing the farmstead of rats who now infest the ruins.<tab><tab>Grain hampers remaining<tab><tab>
target:

source: Poor Maid's Mishap<tab>A band of kobolds led by 382nd Order Pickman Ge Bu has descended on Poor Maid's Mill in search of food and supplies. Aid the Salthounds in driving back the beastmen and defeating their commander.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Poor Maid's Misfortune<tab>The Salthounds looking to restore Poor Maid's Mill cannot seem to catch a break, as now a pack of bloodthirsty coeurls has surrounded the ruins and has already dragged a few of the injured boatswains off into the wood. source: Poor Maid's Misadventure<tab>If it isn't diseased rats, thieving kobolds, or bloodthirsty coeurls threatening to undo all the Salthounds have accomplished at Poor Maid's Mill, it's frenzied buffaloes looking to stomp the old farmstead into oblivion. Join with the former pirates one last time to see that all their efforts weren't for naught.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
プアメイドミル復興：野牛討伐<tab>元海賊「猟犬同盟」が復興中の集落に

source: Revenge of the Worms<tab>At a glance, sandworms seem little more than mindless minions of the desert, but it is now believed that each worm is bound to the others in their community, forming a sort of “hive mind” which recognizes when one part of the group has been injured or killed. This hive mind is now guiding a swarm of the worms towards Forgotten Springs to exact revenge on the U tribe.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Baa Baa Black Sheep<tab>A legend amongst local Coerthan shepherds, Downy Dunstan is said to have wool as black as night and as soft as cloud. The problem is, most are never able to get close enough to the sheep to shear him properly, and those who are usually end up sacrificing a finger or two in the attempt. If someone were to pacify the beast, there would surely be those who would pay generously.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Gavial<tab>Nobles and their pets. One day they will see some tiny creature from the window of their pillowed carriage and simply have to have it...that is, until it grows too large and violent for their quaint seaside villa, at which time they order their majordomo to toss it back into the wild, it now having learned to loathe all who might take advantage of it once again, until it finally has to be put down.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Whiteout<tab>A blinding snowstorm on Abalathia's Spine has caused a pack of goobbues to lose its way and wander down into the more heavily populated areas of the Coerthas highlands. source: A Log Up<tab>The Dravanian Horde launched a brutal assault on the Observatorium just as her astrologians began moving this moon's astroscope logs to the lower library. source: Croc-y Road<tab>A porter on his way to Camp Dragonhead has had his way blocked by a bask of feral crocs. source: A Freeze Is Coming<tab>The fall of Dalamud brought an endless winter to the hills of Coerthas, and with the cold there came creatures of pure ice whose mere existence further rimes the land. Lutin is one of those creatures.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Giant Seps<tab>Many fine Ishgardian knights have fallen to the Dravanian Horde, but one dragon in particular has claimed more lives than most─its name, Seps. The winged aberration must be slain if the souls of its victims are to rest in peace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Riddle Me This<tab>Giants demanding answers to their riddles three are preventing a party of naturalists from returning to Snowcloak. The problem is that even though the naturalists─learned men and women by trade─(somewhat) correctly answered all three riddles, the giants still refuse to let them pass. source: Judge, Jury, and Executioner<tab>Dragonflies of the Dravanian Horde have gathered before Ishgard's final line of land defense─the Gates of Judgement. source: In the Saint's Wake<tab>Every year, pilgrims enter Coerthas to trace the steps of Saint Daniffen, who, long ago, journeyed across the realm, aiding the less fortunate. source: What's on Your Mind<tab>Very little is known about the void other than that the laws that govern our realm do not always apply. In addition to one-eyed monstrosities, peculiar balls of fur, and nightmarish demons, oddities such as floating orbs of energy also periodically break through the boundaries that separate this realm from the void. Make no mistake, however, everything through those rifts does not belong in Eorzea and must be destroyed.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

これを阻止するため、入植地に潜入し
「違法伐採された木材」を破壊せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Four Winds<tab>The four sisters of the Hueloc high clan are feared even by their fellow Ixal for the lack of mercy they show their victims. Though it would be doing the beast tribe a favor, it will not only be the Ixal who benefit from the slaying of the Huelocs.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
烈風の勇士「フェロック四姉妹」<tab>勇猛なる一族として知られる
フェロック家の四姉妹が現れた
フェロック四姉妹を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Inspector Hatchet<tab>Gozol Itzcan the Hatchet is infamous for his endless raids into the Twelveswood to fell ancient sentinels. Track down the feathered fiend while he is perched in Natalan, and see that he never swings an axe again.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
匠の技「工匠のゴゾル・イツカン」<tab>黒衣森から違法伐採した木材で
ナタラン野営地の造営を続ける
蛮族の匠、工匠のゴゾル・イツカンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Svara's Flight<tab>The Observatorium reports that the dragon Svara has been seen flying in the direction of the Steel Vigil. Protect the engineer moving into position to ready the siege machine.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スヴァラ迎撃作戦：工兵護送<tab>黄竜「スヴァラ」がスチールヴィジル方面に
向かうとの観測が、占星台より発せられた
迎撃準備に向かう工兵たちを護れ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Svara's Fear<tab>The engineer is in position and has begun readying the dragonslayer cannons; however, deadly threats approach from all sides. Fend off the encroaching horde so that the engineer can finish his preparations.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スヴァラ迎撃作戦：砲撃準備<tab>黄竜「スヴァラ」を迎撃するため
工兵部隊が対竜カノン砲を設置し始めた
作業完了まで、周囲の安全を確保せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Svara's Fall<tab>The mighty dragon Svara has landed and begun its relentless attack on the Ishgardian defenses. Fight alongside Bertha to turn the tide of battle in your favor.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スヴァラ迎撃作戦：砲撃応戦<tab>遂に黄竜「スヴァラ」が姿を現した
設置した「四連装対竜カノン砲」を活用し
イシュガルドの仇敵、スヴァラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Svara's Fury<tab>The mighty dragon Svara has landed and begun its relentless attack on the Ishgardian defenses. The cannon that was meant to aid the Ishgardian forces, however, has been destroyed. It appears your blades are the only thing that can prevent utter defeat this day.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スヴァラ迎撃作戦：人海戦術<tab>遂に黄竜「スヴァラ」が姿を現したが
切り札「四連装対竜カノン砲」は失われた
死力を尽くして、スヴァラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Behold Now Behemoth<tab>The legendary behemoth has left its mountaintop dominion to hunt...and we are his prey. Gather your blades and your wits and pray to the Twelve for strength, for you will need it to quell the beast's infinite rage.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
伝説の魔獣「ベヒーモス」<tab>恐るべき魔獣ベヒーモスが
狩りのため縄張りの外へと出た
キャンプを守るべく、全力でベヒーモスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: He Taketh It with His Eyes<tab>The behemoth has taken flight back to its dominion. Make chase and finish the legendary beast once and for all.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
手負いの魔獣「ベヒーモス」<tab>縄張りへと引き返した魔獣ベヒーモスを
総力を挙げて追撃し、息の根を止めろ
魔獣ベヒーモスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Eyes Have It<tab>After proving his might on the shores of Turtleback Island, the cyclops Steropes has returned to Eorzea, but this time with a personal army of giants who call themselves the Second Eyes. Defeat Steropes before he can cause any real damage.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
帰ってきた男「ステロペス」<tab>亀甲島で男を上げて帰ってきた単眼族に
ジャイアント族が多数弟子入りし、共に暴れている
謎の暴徒集団の頭目、ステロペスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Storm Caller<tab>Kozol Nomotl the Turbulent, chief among the rank of Ixali occultists, has come to Natalan to personally preside over the summoning of the primal Garuda. Slay the Ixal that the land might be spared a stormy fate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
嵐神呼びし者「風標のコゾル・ノモトル」<tab>嵐神ガルーダ召喚の儀式を司る
高位術師のひとりが入植地に現われた
風標のコゾル・ノモトルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Toll Collector<tab>An adventurer returned to Camp Revenant's Toll to see if she could locate items abandoned there five years past has found the site overrun with poisonous gigantoads. She seeks assistance in clearing away the wavekin.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
失われた風景<tab>崩壊したキャンプに遺品の回収に来た
冒険者が、あまりの魔物の多さに困っている
群れを成すニクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Mud about You<tab>The endless maze of roots and trees already creates enough trouble for those travelers who brave the Tangle; the last thing any of them want to think upon is how to fend off a pack of hungry mudpuppies. Clear the waters of these wavekin, but ware the morbols lurking nearby.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
タングル湿林の大掃除<tab>繁殖した両生類がタングル湿林における
冒険者ギルドの活動の妨げとなっている
マッドパピーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Black and Nburu<tab>The adventurers of Revenant's Toll whisper rumors of a long-dead spirit who is damned to roam the Tangle for eternity, preying on the souls of the living out of pure spite─his name, Nburu.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
湿林の怨念「ンブル」<tab>熟練冒険者の間で噂となっている
タングル湿林に現れる怨霊を始末せよ
邪悪なる怨念、ンブルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Good to Be Bud<tab>When a morbol begins to bud, it can only mean one thing─more morbols. The realm does not need any more morbols.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
モルボル怒りの大増殖<tab>調子に乗った冒険者に制裁を加えるため
モルボルが怒りの大増殖を始めた
ブディング・モルボルをブッコろせ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Standing Guard<tab>Garlean engineers are constantly at work modifying and improving the design of their machina. A new make of vanguard, the H-3, has recently been deployed into the field for testing. Destroy them and stall the march of imperial progress.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
統合整備計画<tab>改良型魔導兵器が駆動試験に臨んでいる
帝国軍の兵器開発を阻害するためにも
魔導ヴァンガード改修型を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Another Notch on the Torch<tab>Gorer of a thousand guts, Porus of the redhorns has taken refuge in the Singing Shards after being pursued halfway across Coerthas by a band of bounty hunters─the bounty hunters his 997th, 998th, 999th, and 1000th victims. See that you aren't his 1001st.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
残忍なる悪鬼「ポリュス」<tab>数々の襲撃事件を引き起こした
凶悪な大型妖異がモードゥナにて確認された
唄う裂谷に潜伏するポリュスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: One Giant Leap<tab>It has recently been discovered in ancient Sharlayan documents that the gigas believe the Crystal Tower a holy place, and that is the reason why the colossal beings have begun gathering in north Silvertear. This, unfortunately, has made it difficult for the Sons of Saint Coinach to conduct their research, what with the gigas constantly destroying their findings.<tab><tab>Documents remaining<tab><tab>
target:
聖地巡礼<tab>クリスタルタワーを聖地と崇める巨人族が
銀泪湖北岸の領有権を主張し暴れている
「財団の調査資材」を守り巨人族を倒せ<tab><tab>財団の調査資材の数<tab><tab>

source: Among Giants<tab>Driven south by the cold weather and lack of prey, many gigas have taken a foothold on the northern shore of Silvertear Lake, much to the chagrin of the Sons of Saint Coinach who are currently in the area studying the ancient ruins and crystalline phenomena. The Sons seek assistance in driving the colossi from the area.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
巨漢の地上げ屋<tab>モードゥナ地方での活動拠点を求めて
ギガース族がレヴナンツトールに進軍した
野蛮なる巨人、ギガース族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Another Day, Another Demon<tab>Most only simple naturalists─their wits the sharpest weapon in their packs─the Sons of Saint Coinach are finding it difficult to carry out their research when it seems like every day they are being hunted by some pack of mythical wild beasts. Today's excitement─a flock of hungry hippogryphs.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ヒッポグリフの晩餐会<tab>聖コイナク財団の調査地の人員を狙い
ヒッポグリフの群れが動き出した
恐るべき捕食者、ヒッポグリフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: That's What Adventurers Are For<tab>The Sons of Saint Coinach find themselves in a bind once again, this time thanks to one Dione─a gigas high priest rumored to be older than time itself. The naturalists won't sleep easy until this menace is resting at the bottom of Silvertear Lake.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
乱れ髪「銀髪のディオネ」<tab>銀泪湖北岸の治安を乱す
ギガース族の高僧が目撃された
銀髪のディオネを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Home Is Where the Horn Is<tab>Hapalits, foul cousins of the ogres, are on the move in search of a new lair, far from the levinbolts of their former abode. The violent creatures have a natural tendency to tear anything moving into two, and so while one might sympathize with their plight to find a new home, it is for the best that they are not allowed to set up camp anywhere nearby.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
銀泪湖ガラガラドッカン<tab>放電地帯から逃れてきたハパリットの一団が
新たな縄張りを求め移動してきた
興奮したハパリットを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Gone with the Shadow<tab>Over the course of the past three nights, three Sons of Saint Coinach have gone missing from their tents. The guards claim they saw nothing but shadows, but perhaps therein lies the answer to this mystery. Let the dark hunt begin!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
夜襲の魔獣「グウィルギ」<tab>ある日の夜、3名の調査員が
黒い影によって襲われ、無残にも惨殺された
犯人と目される魔獣、グウィルギを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Prodigal Son<tab>One of the Sons of Saint Coinach requires an escort deep into dangerous territory so that he may continue his research on the acoustic properties of the aetherial manifestations of the area.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
旅の仲間<tab>聖コイナク財団に所属する調査員が
調査地までの護衛役を探しているようだ
筋骨逞しい調査員を護れ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: V for Vinedetta<tab>More than one weary adventurer has wandered into the Tangle, lured by the sweet smell of a noblewoman's perfume, only to find the gaping maw of Voluptuous Vivian─a massive morbol with a taste for the flesh of man.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
甘い誘惑「ボラプチュア・ビビアン」<tab>官能的な香りの息によって
タングル湿林のヌシの座に上り詰めた
巨大モルボル、ボラプチュア・ビビアンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Return of the King<tab>After a five year absence, the Bombard King has appeared in Eorzea once again (much to the delight of the Cascadiers). Don your uniforms and head into battle with the cadets, protecting the brave men and women while they attempt to dispatch the royal pain.<tab><tab>Cascadiers remaining<tab><tab>
target:
帰ってきた大炎獣「キングボンバード」<tab>超巨大ボム「キングボンバード」が現れた
これを倒そうとするABU隊員を護衛し
ボンバードの群れから死守せよ<tab><tab>ABU隊員の数<tab><tab>

source: Return of the King<tab>After a five year absence, the Bombard King has appeared in Eorzea once again (much to the delight of the Cascadiers). target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Quartz Coupling<tab>After years of searching, doblyn breeding grounds have finally been discovered in eastern Thanalan. Now that we know where they mate, we can stop them from reproducing and save countless tonzes of ore from needless consumption.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ワサワサドブラン<tab>良質の鉱脈を食い荒らすことで知られる害虫
ドブランの繁殖地が発見された
繁殖を防ぐためにも、クォーツドブランを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Man Rides Through<tab>A strange armored figure was recently seen emerging from a fallen piece of Dalamud. Proceed with caution. The creature could be hostile.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
鏡像の騎士<tab>霊災の名残であるダラガブの破片から
不気味な生物が這い出してきた
合成獣ミラーナイトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bad Hair Day<tab>Countless vials of snurble and phurble blood have transformed what was once a man into a mad tangle of golden fur. Put poor Aeetes out of his misery.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
金髪の貴公子「アイエテス」<tab>波打つ金髪を求めてゴールデンフリースの
血を飲み続け、魔物と化した男の首だという
噂の珍獣、アイエテスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Big Bagoly Theory<tab>After showing absolutely no signs that they were any more than twisted masses of metal, debris fallen from Dalamud five summers past is coming to life and brutally attacking those unfortunate enough to come across the inorganic creatures. One of these “mirrorknights,” as the people call them, has been sighted destroying a farmstead nearby.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
醜悪なる合成獣「バドゥ」<tab>不快な合成獣ミラーナイトの中でも
ひときわ大きな個体が確認された
問答無用でバドゥを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Call Me, Mayhaps<tab>A nearby party of Amalj'aa is attempting an Ifrit summoning. Slay the invokers and destroy the glowing cresset used in the rite before the primal's aether finishes gathering.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
荒野の消火活動<tab>イフリートを崇める儀式を妨害せよ
儀式の準備をするアマルジャ族を倒しつつ
「迎え火の燭台」を破壊せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Book of Pride<tab>Bibireze Greysteel and his men believed they could defeat Ifrit. They were wrong, and their hubris cost them their minds. The tempered heroes now wander the deserts of southern Thanalan doing the Lord of the Inferno's bidding. Free these lost souls to the Lifestream.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
哀しき闘士「純鉄のビビレゼ」<tab>イフリート討伐に挑んだものの
聖火に魂を焼かれテンパードと化した
元不滅隊闘士、純鉄のビビレゼを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Tempered, Tempered<tab>Instead of killing his victims, Ifrit will “temper” them, burning away their wills, rendering them mindless servants to the Lord of the Inferno. As a primal is only as powerful as the number of its followers, returning the souls of the tempered to the Lifestream effectively weakens the demigods.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
正義についての話をしよう<tab>祈りを捧げることで、蛮神イフリートの
力の源泉となっている者たちを排除せよ
テンパードたちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Full of Rigor Mortis<tab>To survive, an iron tortoise must consume three times its weight every sennight. These dining habits can put a tax on local foliage, and transform a lush oasis into a barren wasteland in a matter of moons. To prevent the further desertification of southern Thanalan, the iron tortoise population must be thinned.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
甲羅を蹴飛ばせ！<tab>僅かな植物を食い荒らし
砂漠化を進行させる原因となっている
外来の陸亀、アイアントータスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: An Inconvenient Truth<tab>A unit of well-trained Amalj'aa known as the Gore Horde has been dispatched from their homeland Paglth'an with a single purpose─to lay waste to close-lying Ul'dahn settlements. Intercept the unit and wet the sands with beastman blood.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
精鋭部隊「ゴアホード」<tab>パガルザン平原の根拠地より
アマルジャ軍の精鋭部隊が到着した
アマルジャ族の精鋭を倒せ
<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Future Shock<tab>An extremely superstitious lot, the Amalj'aa will, before every march into enemy territory, augur the outcome of the forthcoming battles at the Zanr'ak altar. These bloody ceremonies offer us an opportune time to strike the beastmen unawares. They will never see us coming...or will they!?<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
今日の運勢<tab>軍事行動に際して必ず吉兆占いを行う
アマルジャ軍が、兵を祭場に移動させている
先手を打つべく、アマルジャ族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Taken<tab>Several residents of Little Ala Mhigo have been abducted by a party of tempered servants of Ifrit. Slay the assailants and save the victims before the Lord of the Inferno adds new souls to his ever-growing army.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
友と、家族と<tab>リトルアラミゴの流民がイフリートの
テンパードたちに拉致されてしまった
救出するため、テンパードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Gyve Talk<tab>The Amalj'aa of Zahar'ak have begun gathering troops outside the 1st Gyve in preparation for what can only be a march into Ul'dahn territory. Break their ranks and send the beastmen scattering.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
第一関門攻略戦<tab>ザハラク戦陣の第一関門付近に
アマルジャ軍が兵を集め始めた
防備を固められる前にアマルジャ族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Spark off the Bench<tab>Whitespark Hepugg Roh─an eagle-eyed Amalj'aa archer with the strength to pierce three Immortal Flames with a single arrow─has been sighted lurking nearby. Hunt down the named fiend and see that his sharpshooting days are through.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
速射の名手「火打のハプグ・ロー」<tab>電光石火の早撃ちで不滅隊を苦しめてきた
アマルジャ族の弓の名手が現れた

source: Fallen Corpses Writhe in Style<tab>A band of zombies has been exhibiting uncharacteristically civilized behavior of late, which has greatly unnerved the people of Thanalan. Dispatch the dapper undead for the benefit of the living.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Core Blimey<tab>Ceruleum processing is a complex task that requires a stable environment so as not to disturb the highly unstable liquid. One way to reduce seismic activity in and around the plant is by reinforcing the area with earth sprite cores, and Amajina & Sons draughtsmen are always looking to purchase more.<tab>Deliver the cores to the draughtsman.<tab>Cores delivered<tab><tab>

source: Quenching the Flame<tab>Members of the notorious Flamefang Amalj'aa have assembled in Zahar'ak in preparation for their next raid. Now is the time to strike a blow against these fanatical servants of Ifrit. Defeat the Flamefang commander and his elite minions.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: He's a Firestarter<tab>Flamecrest Afajj Koh, one of Ifrit's foremost priests, has come to Zahar'ak to personally preside over the summoning of his lord. Eliminate the influential Amalj'aa, lest the land be given to the flames.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: 9 to 5<tab>After the Calamity devastated much of Eorzea's workforce, Mamool Ja mercenaries were called over from their homeland to do everything from slay aether-crazed monsters to tile rooves. However, now with the return of a much more stable workforce in adventurers, many of the Mamool Ja find themselves out of work...and have turned to banditry to make ends meet.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Closing Time<tab>Some creatures crave blood, others treasure. But there is one fiend of the night who craves neither. What Sekhmet craves is wine, and he will cease at nothing to get his thieving claws on a bottle of fine grape, be it red or white. He will even go as far as killing a man...which is why he must now be stopped.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

曰く付きの魔獣、セクメトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sweeter than Honey<tab>To attract more bees to pollinate the vineyard, one of the bonds has come up with the idea of applying sweet raincatcher nectar to the grape trestles, and now seeks volunteers to aid him in collecting the liquid from the giant flowers.<tab>Deliver the nectar to the vineyard bond.<tab>Nectar delivered<tab><tab>
target:

source: Ho Ho Ho<tab>Do not be fooled by his jovial laugh, for Jolly Green is aught but joyful. The overgrown goobbue will snatch up and swallow everything within his grasp, and this includes adventurers. Now is the time to turn his frown upside down.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

ジョリーグリーンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Say My Name<tab>Local legend states that he who calls the name of Metshaldjas three times will summon the unspeakable woodland monstrosity from deep beneath the earth to wield destruction on the world above. source: Long Way Home<tab>Slavering beasts block a wine porter's way back to the arms of his loving wife. Put a fear into the creatures so that the lonely lad and his libido can make it home.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Cliff Hanger<tab>Cork bulbs will often choose to set their roots deep in the side of cliffs to better protect themselves from hungry predators. source: Dead Man's Rest<tab>There are some sailors who, even after death, cannot bear to part from the sea, their moans a testament to the chains that bind them to the corporeal realm. Slay these wandering spirits and sever those bonds so that they may return to the Lifestream.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The King's Justice<tab>There are many creatures in Eorzea who call themselves “king”; however, only one of those is a mantis with claws powerful enough to decollate a stone golem─the mantis king. Stay on your toes, or it is off with your head.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Making Waves<tab>Yarr the Wavefiend, he who speaks with Leviathan's voice, has come to the Sapsa Spawning Grounds to see his lord resurrected. Suffice it to say he cannot be allowed to succeed. Slay him, and send his ambitions sinking to the briny depths.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Only Way Is Up<tab>The long and winding road known as the Long Climb is one of only two means to reach Camp Overlook, and when this road is blocked by golems wielded by powerful warlocks looking to rob couriers and caravans, it is the residents of that camp who suffer. source: All Vine and No Popotoes<tab>Ochus released into the forest by sylphs to act as deterrents to those seeking entry into their homeland have begun wandering closer and closer to Gridanian settlements, threatening the smallfolk and their livestock.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
オチュー狩り<tab>シルフ領防衛のため意図的に放たれた
オチューが増殖し、森の秩序を乱している
異常に繁茂したオチューを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Squirrel Trapper's Wife<tab>The grieving widow of a squirrel trapper has offered a bounty for the slaying of the beast that swallowed her husband whole─a sweet-breathed morbol called Capricious Cassie.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
気まぐれ婦人「カプリシャス・キャシー」<tab>獲物を追ってラークスコールに入った
狩人が巨大モルボルにひと呑みにされた
無念を晴らすべく、カプリシャス・キャシーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Enemy of My Enemy<tab>A band of tempered sylphs has engaged a party of imperial scouts most likely dispatched to the Twelveswood to spy on the Order of the Twin Adder. Wait for the sylphs to weaken the scouts and then finish off the Garlean invaders.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ラークスコール遭遇戦<tab>帝国軍の偵察部隊とテンパードシルフが
ラークスコールで遭遇、戦闘が発生した
侵略者たる帝国兵を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Enmity of My Enemy<tab>An entry on gratitude missing from their dictionaries, the surviving sylphs have flown back to the Sylphlands to gather reinforcements...and launch an attack on you! Fend off the waves of budding beastmen while seeing that the lightly armed Mianne Thousandmalm stays in the realm of the living.<tab><tab>Mianne Thousandmalm<tab><tab>
target:
続ラークスコール遭遇戦<tab>シルフ領へと逃げ帰ったテンパードシルフが
増援を引き連れて戻ってきた
「千里眼のミアヌ」を守り、シルフ族を倒せ<tab><tab>千里眼のミアヌ<tab><tab>

source: Below His Station<tab>Imperial pilus prior Aulus rem Vulso, accompanied by a thin retinue of soldiers, has embarked on a rare outing to personally observe warmachina wreckage. His defeat would deal the Empire a crushing blow. Do not let this chance slip away!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
千人隊長「アウルス・レム・ヴルソ」<tab>帝国軍の千人隊長が少ない護衛を伴い
魔導兵器の残骸を調べている
好機を逃さず、アウルス・レム・ヴルソを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Got Milkroot<tab>Milkroot is a curse upon the people of the Twelveswood, destroying lives and tearing apart families. The sylphs who grow the deadly drug must be dealt with, but until they can be found, we must concentrate our efforts on ridding the forest of the saplings.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ミルク・クラッシュ<tab>根から抽出される精神高揚成分を求めて
テンパードシルフが妖花を栽培している
ミルクルート・サップリングを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Breaking Dawn<tab>Tempered sylphs have prepared a feast for Daxio of the Dawn─a powerful weaver of spells who uses milkroot to conjure visions of the future. The revelry must be stopped lest the sylphs defile the sacred forest and anger the elementals.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
幽谷の薬師「覚醒のダキシオ」<tab>ミルクルートで秘薬を作り
宴で供するシルフ族の呪い師を排除せよ
覚醒のダキシオを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Handful of Dreams<tab>To induce even more powerful visions, tempered sylphs add the excretions of dreamtoads to their milkroot solutions. This blend, however, oft proves too toxic for the unknowing taker, and can lead to coma or even death. Little can be done to stop the production of milkroot, but the fewer toads to gather oil from, the harder it will be for the sylphs to brew the more potent varieties.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ビューティフル・ドリーマー<tab>テンパードシルフは、ミルクルートの効能を
高めるために、「ガマ油」を添加しているらしい
シルフ族が養殖しているドリームトードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bush Blade<tab>Elder sylph Volxia of the Blade has begun his daily rounds of the Sylphlands. Use this opportunity to slay the leader and weaken the beast tribe from the top down.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
幽谷の衛士「葉刃のヴォルキシア」<tab>領内の巡回警備にあたる
シルフ族の衛士長が現れた
葉刃のヴォルキシアを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Everything's Better<tab>Masters of poisons, the sylphs utilize all manner of the forest's flora and fauna to create their deadly tinctures. One of those materials is a funguar known as the sylph bonnet for the hood-like shape of the cap. The poison from one cap can sicken an entire army, so it is best that the creatures are disposed of before the beastmen find them.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
とてとて楽しいキノコ狩り<tab>テンパードシルフが毒薬を精製するために
毒キノコを栽培しているとの情報を得た
毒薬の原料、シルフボンネットを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Gale that Rocks the Cradle<tab>Pulxio of the Short Gale is the stone-hearted sylph tasked with taking newly sprouted sylph bulbs away from the Seedbed for tempering. The first step in stopping a new generation of brainwashed sylphs from ruling the forest is to take Pulxio's life. <tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
敬虔なる養育者「風狂のプルシオ」<tab>シルフ族が生まれる「ゆりかごの大樹」にて
幼生体をテンパード化させる養育役
風狂のプルシオを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Rogue on the Water<tab>Once a vast lake, home to myriad wavekin, the water of Rootslake has been sucked nigh dry by rogue sprites. Cull the creatures and restore the area's aetherial balance.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
液状化現象<tab>属性の力が乱れたことでスプライトが発生し
根渡り沼の地盤が緩む原因となっている
ウォータースプライトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: To Train a Tortoise<tab>The ragtag band of cutthroats and thieves known collectively as the Redbelly Wasps have got it in their heads that an adamantoise might be trained to crush their enemies, and now they dart about Rootslake poking and prodding the otherwise peaceful giants into a frenzy. Cuff the troublemakers before the entire area is overrun with angry adamantoises.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
カメェェェッー！<tab>ならず者集団「似我蜂団」が、戦力にするため
アダマンタスを捕獲しようとしている
亀を追う似我蜂団を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Fate Is a Fecal Mistress<tab>The countless steaming pools of fecal ooze left by the stropers who have invaded Rootslake since its waters were drained are making those stationed at the nearby camp sick and unfit to fight. Help is sought in clearing the area of the vined creatures in a last-ditch effort to clear the air.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
臭い物にはフタをしろ<tab>ストローパーの排泄物により
根渡り沼の悪臭が日に日に悪化している
諸悪の根源、ストローパーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What Gored Before<tab>Trained for boar fighting by a sylph elder, Phaia had not fought two battles before turning on his master and consuming him in a single bite. Now the former champion of the boar pits roams free in the wood, goring those foolish enough to stand in his way.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
最後の闘猪王「パイア」<tab>育ての親であったシルフ族の長老を食い殺し
野に放たれた「闘猪」用の怪物を排除せよ
元闘猪チャンピオン、パイアを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Don't Disturb This Grove<tab>Gods' Quiver outrunners have spotted several Ixal felling trees within the sacred boundary of the Hedge. Adventurers nearby are asked to drive the beastmen back north out of the Twelveswood.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
伐採部隊迎撃戦<tab>木材資源を狙いイクサル族の伐採部隊が
黒衣森に侵入したとの情報を得た
イクサル族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Rude Awakening<tab>Damage wrought by the Calamity has freed frightening apparitions long bound to the forest for terrible deeds committed in ages past. A vengeful spirit given the name Daedalus is one such prisoner. Send the silent knight back to his eternal prison beneath the loam.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
遺跡の亡霊騎士「ダイダロス」<tab>遺跡地帯に謎めいた亡霊騎士が現れ
黒衣森の防衛に多大な影響を与えている
亡霊騎士、ダイダロスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Air Supply<tab>The Gods' Quiver seeks volunteers to join a raid of the Ixali logging grounds, the main targets being not the Ixal themselves, but the airstones the swiftbeaks use to give their war balloons flight.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
イクサル軍伐採所強襲作戦<tab>神勇隊と共にイクサル軍伐採所を強襲せよ
装甲気球の推進源「風生みの珠」を破壊しつつ
イクサル・スウィフトビークを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Smells Like Tree Spirit<tab>Angered at the needless felling of his brethren, the Great Oak has lifted his roots from the Twelveswood floor and has set out to exact revenge...on anything without roots.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
怒れる守護者「グレートオーク」<tab>違法伐採に怒り狂った森の守護者が
誰彼かまわず近づく者を攻撃している
グレートオークを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
<tab>北ザナラーンにてダハーカが急増したのは
大型の牝種が原因であると判明した
すべての元凶、ラクモンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
<tab>北ザナラーンにてダハーカが急増したのは
大型の牝種が原因であると判明した
すべての元凶、ラクモンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Red Baron<tab>Fat on the ceruleum of the surrounding fields, the bomb baron has grown bold and now makes his way to the Ceruleum Processing Plant, intent on draining its tanks and then self-destructing in one brilliant blaze of glory, taking half of northern Thanalan with him. Stop the hot-headed voidsent before his plan can be brought to fruition.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
灼熱の男爵「ボムバロン」<tab>青燐水を飲むことで燃焼効率を高め
強大な個体へと成長したボムを始末せよ
灼熱の男爵、ボムバロンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Just a Sip<tab>Quartz doblyns have gathered near the Ceruleum Processing Plant in search of food, that food being none other than ceruleum. Amajina & Sons will not stand idly by and watch as their profits are sucked down by pesky soulkin, and entreat adventurers to deal with the problem immediately.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ゴクゴクドブラン<tab>青燐水を飲み干そうと
ドブランたちが青燐精製所に押し寄せてきた
クォーツドブランを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: East Meets Worst<tab>For no apparent reason, a flock of voidsent ahrimans has chosen to harass the keepers of the east watchtower. Entrusted with more important tasks, such as watching, the soldiers have issued a plea to all nearby adventurers to gather and drive away the creatures─preferably to somewhere in the vicinity of the west watchtower.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
監視者の影<tab>東方監視塔に駐留する不滅隊が
妖異の集団移動を確認した
北ザナラーンの脅威、アーリマンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
<tab>ラウバーン緩衝地に妖異ダハーカが
群れを成しているとの報告があった
青燐精製所の安全のため、ダハーカを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
<tab>ラウバーン緩衝地に妖異ダハーカが
群れを成しているとの報告があった
青燐精製所の安全のため、ダハーカを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Twinkle, Twinkle Little Trap<tab>Ever the pests, a gaggle of quartz doblyns has dug into a patch of land near the Royal Allagan Starway, where they wait for caravans carrying ceruleum back to Ul'dah for sale and export. Many of the caravans do not have the means of clearing the roads themselves and request the aid of able-bodied adventurers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
鋼虫の罠<tab>青燐水を飲み干そうとドブランの群れが
青燐水の輸送路で待ち伏せしている
クォーツドブランを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Ceruleum Road<tab>A frugal merchant bound for the Ceruleum Processing Plant to discuss business was abandoned by the two bodyguards he hired in Ul'dah after refusing to give in to their demands for more coin. Now, but a few malms from the plant, he finds himself helpless, and seeks to employ an adventurer to accompany him for the remainder of his journey.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
セルリウムロード<tab>青燐精製所へ商談に赴こうとしている
商人が護衛を求めているようだ
「慎重な商人」を護れ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dark Devices - The Plea<tab>A poor farmer named Addison claims his only daughter was captured and taken away by the Lambs of Dalamud─a frightening cult which, even after the fall of the lesser moon, still offers blood sacrifices to their false god in hopes of currying his favor. The farmer seeks aid in reclaiming that which was ripped from his hands.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
救世神の生贄：誘拐編<tab>カルト集団「最後の群民」に拐われた娘を
救ってほしいとアディソンに頼まれた
紅色の衣をまとった最後の群民を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dark Devices - The Bait<tab>It seems the tale told by Addison was a trap to lure you into the Lambs of Dalamud's grasp. Slay the cultists or become their next sacrifice!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
救世神の生贄：待伏編<tab>誘拐騒ぎは冒険者を誘い込むための罠だった
冒険者を生贄に捧げようと押し寄せる
最後の群民を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dark Devices - The Switch<tab>Not to see their diabolical plans thwarted by a nonbeliever, Twin-tongued Addison and his daughter Milburh the Malicious step forth from the shadows. Slay the family and send them plummeting to the seventh hell so that they might join their master.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
救世神の生贄：誅殺編<tab>冒険者を誘い込み、始末することに失敗した
「最後の群民」の父娘が本性を現した
アディソンとミルブルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dark Devices - The End<tab>Sensing defeat, Milburh the Malicious sacrifices her carnal form to the void where a succubus claims it for her own. Strike down the cultist and drive the voidsent from her corpse.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
救世神の生贄：妖異編<tab>万策尽きたミルブルが自らを生贄に捧げ
妖異サキュバスを肉体に憑依させた
妖異と化したミルブルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Go, Go, Gorgimera<tab>Created by a madman employing forbidden alchemy and fell magicks, the gorgimera is a bastardization that cannot be allowed to roam free, lest it spread its taint across the entire realm.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
荒れ狂う巨獣「ゴーキマイラ」<tab>新鮮な獲物を求め、驚異の合成獣が現れた
おこぼれにあずかろうとする魔獣にも注意しつつ
荒れ狂う巨獣、ゴーキマイラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sister Crustacean<tab>A spawning megalocrab will do whatever it takes to see its brood safe, and that includes using its powerful claws to dismember Lalafellin fishers who draw too close to the wavekin's unhatched offspring. Slay a crab, save a lad.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
その水棲動物を見よ<tab>産卵期を迎えたメガロクラブの群れが
周辺地域の脅威となっている
スポーニング・メガロクラブを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Tender Buttons<tab>Gluttonous Gertrude was just another plump dodo on the farm...until she bit the arse off one of the stable boys at Swiftperch and escaped into Quarterstone. Seek out the ravenous bird and slay her before another rump goes missing.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
暴食の怪鳥「グルタナスガーティ」<tab>あまりの大食ぶりから愛想を尽かされ
牧童に捨てられ、野生化した怪鳥
グルタナスガーティを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Armored Beast<tab>The Brass Blades are hopelessly overmatched by an armored beast of unknown origin. Help Lightning defeat the hulking creature, and save the struggling soldiers from a bloody fate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：巨獣迎撃戦<tab>正体不明の魔物が確認された
謎の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
未知なる巨獣を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Armored Beast<tab>The Brass Blades are hopelessly overmatched by an armored beast of unknown origin. Help Lightning defeat the hulking creature, and save the struggling soldiers from a bloody fate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：巨獣迎撃戦<tab>正体不明の魔物が確認された
謎の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
未知なる巨獣を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Dread on Arrival<tab>A magitek-like machine is running rampant, threatening all nearby with its uncontrolled thrashing. Join Lightning in dismantling this dreadful contraption.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：機獣討伐戦<tab>魔導アーマーに似た機械が暴れている
謎の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
ドレッドノートを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Dread on Arrival<tab>A magitek-like machine is running rampant, threatening all nearby with its uncontrolled thrashing. Join Lightning in dismantling this dreadful contraption.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：機獣討伐戦<tab>魔導アーマーに似た機械が暴れている
謎の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
ドレッドノートを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Anubys Assault<tab>The mindless tide of chaos threatens to flood the realm of Eorzea. Fight at Lightning's side as she seeks to repel the Anubys invaders that herald the coming of unthinkable doom.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：アヌビス殲滅戦<tab>混沌の力がエオルゼアを蝕もうとしている
異邦の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
押し寄せるアヌビスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - Anubys Assault<tab>The mindless tide of chaos threatens to flood the realm of Eorzea. Fight at Lightning's side as she seeks to repel the Anubys invaders that herald the coming of unthinkable doom.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：アヌビス殲滅戦<tab>混沌の力がエオルゼアを蝕もうとしている
異邦の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
押し寄せるアヌビスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Lightning Strikes - On Wings of Chaos<tab>The mindless tide of chaos threatens to flood the realm of Eorzea. Fight at Lightning's side as she faces a terrible incarnation of chaotic energy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
閃光の影向：屍竜討滅戦<tab>混沌の力がエオルゼアを蝕もうとしている
異邦の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し
混沌の屍竜を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

異邦の女騎士、ライトニングと協力し

source:
Brick by Brick<tab>A cadre of earthen brickmen appears!
Watch your back, and defeat these lumbering golems!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不思議な魔物「ゴーレム」<tab>ゴーレムが　あらわれた！
いのちだいじに
まものを　やっつけろ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Brick by Stone Brick<tab>A stone brickman appears!
Fight wisely, and topple this towering menace!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不思議な魔物「ストーンマン」<tab>ストーンマンが　あらわれた！
みんながんばれ
まものを　やっつけろ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source:
Brick by Gold Brick<tab>A stone brickman appears!
A golden brickman appears!
Show no mercy to these hostile invaders!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不思議な魔物「ゴールドマン」<tab>ストーンマンが　あらわれた！
ゴールドマンが　あらわれた！
ガンガンいこうぜ　まものを　やっつけろ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Embiggened Spriggans<tab>A magically enhanced pack of spriggans runs rampant, causing no end of stress. What foul sorcery could be responsible for such a mess? Slay the cute but ruinous beasts, and restore to the land a measure of peace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
黒い悪魔：実験の成果<tab>何者かの魔法実験により
スプリガンが驚異の力を得た
マジケッド・スプリガンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Tower of Power<tab>An otherworldly being has come to Eorzea to unleash its wrath, leaving wanton destruction in its path. Put down this towering foe, that the realm be saved from further woe.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
黒い悪魔：過激な淑女<tab>次元を超越した謎の存在が
エオルゼアの地で暴れ回っている
過激な淑女、黒い悪魔を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
