source: A Wrench in the Works<tab>The Garleans have been putting a new and improved suit of armor through its paces in the heart of the Twelveswood. Reduce this marvel of technology to a smoking wreck.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
高機動試作機「プロトアーマー」<tab>機動性を向上させた試作型魔導兵器が
黒衣森にて不整地走行試験に臨んでいる
プロトアーマーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What a Boar<tab>A thoroughbred sylphic fighting boar known as Kafre has turned on its masters and is now wreaking havoc in the Twelveswood. The savage creature has never known defeat; that must change, else there will be more sapshed.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
狂乱の闘猪「カフレ」<tab>シルフ族が闘猪のために育てた凶暴な猪が
同族相手に暴れ回り、森を荒らしている
荒れ狂う闘猪、カフレを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Stay Frosty<tab>Fire-imbued imps are determined to reduce the wayward snowman to a muddy puddle. To defeat them and save the Starlight Celebration, you must armor yourself in the snow being thrown by the treants. The treants will not relinquish the snow willingly─you know what must be done.<tab><tab>Sentient Snowman<tab><tab>
target:
星芒祭：魔法の雪だるま<tab>星芒祭をブチ壊しにしようとする
いたずら者のインプから雪だるまを守れ
雪の加護を受け、イグナイター・インプを倒せ<tab><tab>雪だるま<tab><tab>

source: Making the Rounds<tab>Sparing no effort to see every last speck of wealth in the mines funneled directly into his personal coffers, the covetous Zo Ga has sent a savage henchman, 59th Order Roundsman Ge Ga, to claim a new tunnel in his name. In lieu of delivering a lecture of the merits of proper wealth distribution, cut the blackguard down where he stands.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
妖異殺し「ラウンズマン59 ゲ・ガ」<tab>発掘された石像型妖異を制圧するため
荒くれ揃いの第59洞穴団が出撃した
ラウンズマン59 ゲ・ガを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What's Yours Is Mine<tab>A band of spriggans have spoiled this year's egg hunt, stealing all the eggs and the various goodies they hold. Retrieve the eggs, and see that no present is left unopened.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
狂乱のエッグハント<tab>飾りタマゴを盗み出した
盗人スプリガンの集団を発見した
スプリガン・エッガーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Eggcelsior<tab>You know what they say about spriggans with big eggs: they have big prizes. Now go and get it!<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
賢者のタマゴ「ジョーカー・エッガー」<tab>飾りタマゴの力で賢者になろうと企む
盗人スプリガンのリーダーを発見した
ジョーカー・エッガーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Main Street Spectral Parade<tab>The Continental Circus wants <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> for its splendidly spooky parade. While transfigured, follow the ogre pumpkinhead along Emerald Avenue and cast the Festal Cant charm on the citizens who have come to spectate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
コンチネンタル・パレード<tab>魔物や有名人に変身し、
パンプキンヘッドの魔人と共に回廊を練り歩け
ウルダハの市民におまじないをかけろ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Gloria in Eggcelsis<tab>Don your most sable of spriggan suits and crack, crush, shatter, and smash your way into Hatching-tide history. Leave no enormous egg unscrambled.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ジャイアントエッグハント<tab>奇祭エッグハントに参加せよ
スプリガンに変身して
ジャイアントエッグを叩き割れ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Wave Good-bye<tab>Wavekin in the clouds? It matters not how they arrived, only that they leave─now─before the residents of Moghome find themselves pom-deep in slimy scales and flapping fins.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
キャッチ・アンド・リリース<tab>ドラゴン族が戯れに地上から運んできた
水棲種族が雲海で、繁殖を続けている
モーグリ族の生活を脅かす、ロプケンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Nuts<tab>In retrospect, stuffing an archaeosaur's nostrils full of kupo nuts while it slept probably wasn't the best of ideas. So sayeth the mischievous moogle currently fleeing for its life from a pack of bloodthirsty scalekin.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
さよならアルケオダイノス<tab>悪戯者のモーグリ族の挑発により
アルケオダイノスたちが暴れ始めた
猛り狂うアルケオダイノスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Glycon Air<tab>Direct descendant of the vengeful Tioman, Glycon's blood runs as black as that of his progenitor. Slay the dark dragon and grant his troubled soul peace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
黒竜の使徒「グリコン」<tab>黒竜ティオマンの血を受けし眷属が
復讐のために立ち上がった
黒竜の使徒、グリコンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Coin Toss<tab>Some moogles are slaves to fashion, others to fortune. And then there are those who are slaves to both and create their fashion out of other's fortunes─in this case, a necklace made of old coins on a string. Coins collected by you, of course.<tab>Deliver Dravanian coins to the modish moogle.<tab>Coins delivered<tab><tab>
target:
モーグリ金融道<tab>光り物好きのぴかぴかモーグリが

source: Supper Time<tab>There is one thing that an archaeosaur enjoys more than feeding, and that is feeding on plump, juicy moogles. Stop the slavering scalekin before they make their way into Moghome.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sprite Club<tab>It has been observed that increased activity by lightning-aspected dragons is accompanied by an increase in sprites of the same charge. Slay the sprites and restore aetherial balance to the area.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Whole Food<tab>No, that frantic flurry of “kupos” you hear is not your imagination, but the sound of an unlucky moogle swallowed whole by Abelisk─a towering archaeosaur with an insatiable appetite. Help slice open a path to freedom before the big lizard's bile does its work.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

source: Say it Tulihand<tab>The Dravanian Horde is gathering forces for an aerial attack on Ishgard proper. Scatter the tulihands as they arrive, putting an end to the assault before it begins.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Vouivre Believre<tab>Infuriated at the foiling of their plot, the vouivres who called for the tulihand assault on Ishgard's walls have gathered to mete punishment on the meager mortals who would so foolishly stand against the Horde.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

復讐に燃えるヴィーヴルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Waugyl Waugyl Waugyl<tab>Master of the Monsterie, Waugyl the Warring has descended from his perch to prey on those bold, or foolhardy, enough to make the winding journey through the Landlord Colony.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: How to Cane Your Dragon<tab>A small band of lesser dragons serving the mighty Nidhogg has begun assailing Zenith in a rather futile attempt to topple the spire and please their ever-wroth master. Show the dragons the glimmer of your steel and drive them off before any grave damage is done.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

邪竜に連なるドラゴン族が集結している
野蛮なるレッサードラゴンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Aevis Has Left the Building<tab>Enraged at seeing their brethren sent back to their lairs with their tails 'twixt their legs, a pack of slightly less witless, yet far more arrogant cloud aevis have come to seek vengeance for pride wounded.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

その眷属たちが援軍に駆けつけた
増援のクラウドエイビスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Asah, I Came, I Conquered<tab>The road to Asah is already perilous enough without an adamantine monstrosity blocking passage and sucking the marrow from the bones of unfortunate travelers. Slay Cuelebre and ensure that if travelers are to have their marrow sucked, it will not be because of a road-blocking dragon.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Waiting for Fjalar to Stall<tab>Mistdragon Fjalar, loyal subject to Hraesvelgr, maintains his vigilant watch over Zenith and the Churning Mists as he awaits the return of his lord. There are those, however, who would see Fjalar fail at his task─minions of the hate-driven Nidhogg.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

迫り来る邪竜の眷属を警戒している

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Don't Know Wyvern<tab>Elder wyverns serving the Dravanian Horde have returned to the Churning Mists after completing a deadly assault on Ishgardian settlements in Coerthas. Attack the creatures while their wounds are still fresh, and see that they never return to the lower realm.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
燃えよワイバーン<tab>クルザスの襲撃を終えた飛竜の群れが
ドラヴァニア雲海へと帰還してきた
エルダーワイバーンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: From Dusk till Gone<tab>One of the final, and most infamous Horde assaults on the Dusk Vigil before the stronghold's eventual fall was the massacre helmed by the merciless wyvern Minaruja. Since that day, the knights of Ishgard have sworn vengeance. Mayhap this is the day it shall be had.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
薄暮の飛竜「ミナルジャ」<tab>かつてダスクヴィジルを強襲し
多数の騎兵を惨殺した獰猛な飛竜が現れた
薄暮の飛竜、ミナルジャを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Treehouse of the Spirits<tab>Blood spilled in recent battles has soaked the dry soil of the Churning Mists, drawing forth thirstful spirits such as the arboreal meliae. As always, satisfaction will not be found in the amount retrieved, and they will soon turn to attacking the living to wet their tongues.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
来たのは誰だ<tab>雲海の大地に血が流された結果
それを吸い上げたナールド・メリアエが興奮し始めた

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: As the World Burns<tab>As if slaughtering defenseless Ishgardians was not enough, the high dragon Kucedre will go out of his way to defile the most sacred of Ishgardian monuments, so that we may ever be reminded of his power. Slay the unforgivable villain and bring peace to the land once again.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
猛炎の焔竜「クシェドレ」<tab>かつてハルドラス像をブレスで焼いた
手配中の大物ドラゴン族が確認された
猛炎の焔竜、クシェドレを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: It's the Moogle, Reinvented<tab>Bound by ancient covenant entered with Hraesvelgr, the moogles of the Churning Mists will periodically make the journey to Zenith to clean the sacred spire of any defilement done at the hands of Nidhogg's underlings. A recent increase in Horde activity, however, has made the journey impossible without escort.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
吸引力は変わらない<tab>聖竜との盟約に従うモーグリ族が
手入れをするため白亜の宮殿に向かう
綺麗好きのふきふきモーグリを送り届けろ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Corporal Pomishment<tab>A thorough scolding by Mogpo the Magnificent was not enough to convince Mogoosh the Misbehaving that his recent run of mischief has put the lives of all Moghome's moogles in peril. Mogpo has asked you to rough up the rascal until he repents.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲海の問題児「悪童のモグーシ」<tab>2匹のモーグリ族が口論している
無謀な行動で仲間を危険にさらした
悪童のモグーシをこらしめろ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Infamous<tab>The Horde has temporarily turned its vengeful gaze from Ishgard to the few dragons who still maintain their allegiance to Hraesvelgr─Galar of the Second Sun being one such acolyte. Aid the aged dragon in driving back his assailants before he succumbs to the wounds already dealt him.<tab><tab>Galar<tab><tab>
target:
聖と邪の交わるひずみ<tab>聖竜に連なる友好的なドラゴン族が
邪竜の眷属に襲われている
蒼竜ガラールを守り抜け<tab><tab>ガラール<tab><tab>

source: Ain't Misbehaving<tab>Mogoosh is back to his misbehaving ways, this time picking on someone his own size, a brood of newborn dragonlings nesting in Zenith. The good moogles of Moghome have tried reasoning with the mischief-maker, but now seek a more...painful form of persuasion.<tab><tab>Zenith dragonling<tab><tab>
target:
愚行の問題児「悪童のモグーシ」<tab>問題児のモーグリ族、悪童のモグーシが

source: Metal Gears Rising<tab>Rumors of a new “whizzlepop” gear being developed by the diabolical Illuminati have Idyllshire inhabitants worried for their well-being. All they need do now is acquire several whizzlepops from Illuminati members to find out exactly <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> the contraptions are and if there actually <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> any cause for concern.<tab>Deliver Illuminati whizzlepops to Slicktrix.<tab>Whizzlepops delivered<tab><tab>
target:
悪魔の機械<tab>科学者集団「青の手」に所属するゴブリン族が

source: Metal Gears Revengeance<tab>Seeking retribution for whizzlepops fizzled, a party of Illuminati revengers has been dispatched into the Arkhitekton. Slay the gate-crashing goblins and put an end to their virulent vendetta.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

「青の手」が報復部隊を送り込んできた
ブルーハンド・リベンジャーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Metal Gears Revengeance 2<tab>The old adage that revenge is a dish best served cold unfortunately does not translate well into gobbiespeak, and the Illuminati have deployed a massive magitek vangob, seeking further revenge for the quashing of their first (failed) attempt at revenge.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
全面改修機「III号ゴブリガードJ型」<tab>報復部隊を撃退された「青の手」が
さらなる増援として新型兵器を投入してきた
III号ゴブリガードJ型を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Tarantula Hawk, Pro Stinger<tab>A lack of tarantulas in the Dravanian hinterlands has tarantula hawks seeking other potential victims to serve as nourishment for their larvae. Exterminate the swarm before they set their compound eyes on puppies or kittens or baby Lalafells.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
タランチュラホークの襲撃<tab>肉食性の非常に獰猛な蜂の群れが
獲物を求めて移動を開始した
タランチュラホークを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Wild Wilde Death<tab>What does one do when two breeds of pests known for destroying crops and raiding pens are found fighting each other for territorial dominance? Why, use the opportunity to slay both, what else?<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ワイルドでいこう！<tab>ワイルドビーストとワイルドラーテルが
縄張り争いを繰り広げている
これを好機に、害獣を全て倒せ！<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Gets the Red Out<tab>Thought to have been bred by a Sharlayan alchemist who was working on an improved recipe for eye drops, Epaphus was abandoned by his master during the exodus which emptied the northwestern city<var 1F /var>state, leaving the beast to wreak havoc on the lives of those few who remained.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
巨眼の魔牛「エパポス」<tab>シャーレアンの錬金術師が
目薬の開発用に飼育していた実験獣
巨眼の魔牛、エパポスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Makes the Very Best...Nests<tab>The absence of bibliothecaries in the Great Gubal Library since the Sharlayans' mass exodus back to their homeland has allowed all manner of vilekin─including the damselfly─to use the remaining tomes as nests. Exterminate the pests so that further damage to the library might be lessened.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
図書館清掃<tab>幻想図書館の管理人が消え去ったことで
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E0A01 /var>が異常に繁殖してしまった
増えすぎた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E0A01 /var>を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Olympus Has Pollen<tab>Despite their heavy-duty masks, the good goblins of Idyllshire have recently been plagued with watery eyes and sniffly snouts─the culprit believed to be the pollen of the narbroois. Until the beastmen can retool their masks to filter this irksome irritant, a bounty has been placed on the seedkin's heads.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
花粉前線異常アリ<tab>繁茂したナルブルーイの花粉が
大量に舞い散り、問題となっている
鼻炎の大敵、ナルブルーイを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Feed Me, See More<tab>While most of Eorzea's carnivorous plants are immobile, limiting the danger they pose to other creatures, narbroois are not bound to the soil, making them possible threats to the realm's inhabitants─Ruginis being the biggest...and hungriest threat of all.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
吸血の浮遊草「ルギニス」<tab>動物を捕らえ、その血液を養分とする
凶暴なナルブルーイが飛来してきた
吸血の浮遊草、ルギニスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Pop Goes the Whizzle<tab>After failing to revenge the failed attempt at revenging the theft of their whizzlepops, the Illuminati have given up on revenge and simply decided that if they can't have the items, no one can, sending a small army to destroy them. Help the goblins of Idyllshire protect the whizzlepops, if only to simply spite the Illuminati.<tab><tab>Whizzlepops remaining<tab><tab>
target:
ゴブゴブ紛争<tab>ゴブリン達が回収した試作装置を破壊するため
科学者集団「青の手」の強襲部隊が攻めてきた
「青の手」を撃退し、謎の試作装置を守れ！<tab><tab>謎の試作装置の数<tab><tab>

source: Revenge of the Vengeful Revengeance<tab>Unable to exact revenge, exact revenge for an inability to exact revenge, or destroy crates because of an inability to exact revenge for an inability to exact revenge, the Illuminati have dispatched the highly decorated Moundrinx Eightclinks in a last-ditch effort to prove they are not nearly as incompetent as everyone now thinks.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
熟練の戦闘指揮官「八丁のマウンドリンクス」<tab>試作装置の破壊に失敗した「青の手」が
決着を付けるべく戦闘部隊を派遣してきた
熟練の戦闘指揮官、八丁のマウンドリンクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ratel and Hum<tab>Drawn to the waste piles of Bigwest Shortstop, a pack of diseased ratels has descended from the surrounding mountains to feed. As even a single bite will bring on a dread fever, it is crucial that the beasts be put down swiftly and without mercy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
尻尾を立てろ！<tab>攻撃性の強いラーテルの群れが
廃都シャーレアンでの活動の妨害となっている
生息圏を広げるラーテルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dobharch Did It for the Best<tab>Drawn to the dying screams of her children, Dobharch─ratel matron─has come seeking payment in blood for the lives lost in the previous day's culling.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

大型の個体が現れ、獲物を探している
野獣の家長、ダルウフーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Infant Vangob<tab>Trouble with the jangletype vangob (namely that its jangling would give away its position to the enemy) has prompted the Illuminati to develop a new model of vangob─the espertype, supposedly capable of anticipating the movements of its targets. Destroy the prototypes before the goblins can begin mass production.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
西方電撃戦<tab>科学者集団「青の手」が新型サスペンションを採用した
改良型ゴブリガードの量産を急いでいる
配備されたIII号ゴブリガードE型を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Morbol Man<tab>Seedlings forgotten in Saint Mocianne's Arboretum have since grown into ferocious great morbols. If that was not enough, southerlies off Mount Gubal carry the stench from their maws directly into Idyllshire where the unmasked residents are doomed to suffer until the winds change...or kind adventurers lend a helping hand.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
モルボルをブッコろせ<tab>聖モシャーヌ植物園の温室で育てられていた
モルボルグレートが溢れ出してきた
臭すぎるモルボルグレートを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: On Melancholic Hill<tab>What tragic event brought unbalance to poor Moira's humours, resulting in an excess of black bile is unknown. What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> known is that the overgrown morbol has already devoured three goblins, four Lalafells, and a rolanberry cake baked to celebrate the nameday of Idyllshire's oldest resident. The seedkin must be stopped before any more pastry is lost.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

憂鬱なる令嬢、メランコリック・モイラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sun Bear, Sun Bear, What Do You Eat<tab>It is said that once a sun bear acquires a taste for the flesh of man, it will eat nothing else. Two missing Miqo'te lovers who were last seen in the Answering Quarter─an area now overrun with violent sun bears─suggest that taste has already been acquired.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

イディルシャイアの住人の脅威となっている
害獣と化したサンベアーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Bear Up There<tab>Dravanian folklore tells of a mighty Hellsguard forty hands tall who wrestled with Dubhe─the deadliest sun bear on all Abalathia's Spine. Nothing more is mentioned of the Roegadyn, but Dubhe still terrorizes the land today.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

アバラシア山脈から降りてきた
血濡れの暴君、ドゥーベを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Birds and the Bears<tab>Sun bears will often raid the nests of cockatrices looking for eggs to crack open and devour. This practice, obviously, is not looked kindly upon by mother cockatrices who will furiously defend their broods to the death. Bears weakened from cockatrice attacks, however, make easy prey for adventurers looking to earn a little extra coin.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

好機を活かし、害獣サンベアーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Escort the poor poroggo safely back to her master and receive a hefty reward.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Frog Days of Summer<tab>When abandoning their Eorzean settlement, the Sharlayans left more than their tomes and their tuffets, they left their poroggo familiars, who now, after waiting patiently for their masters to return home, have decided it is time to release nigh on twenty summers of pent-up rage.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Toss 'Em Back<tab>A school of migrating opken have infested the waters of the Dravanian hinterlands, eating anything and everything the wavekin can fit their maws about, including fish harvested by the goblins of Idyllshire. Seek out the scaled abominations and send them back to the sea.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

「愛書家のブラウフィクス」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した古書の断片の数<tab><tab>

source: Cockatrice Block<tab>Several domesticated cockatrices have escaped from their coop and taken up residence in the Great Gubal Library, tearing apart priceless tomes to create makeshift nests atop guano-striped bookshelves. The cloudkin will, however, emerge to hunt, offering a rare opportunity for capture.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
コカトリスの思い出<tab>野生化した家禽が繁殖し
幻想図書館を荒れ果てさせている
獰猛な元家畜、コカトリスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Come Shells or High Water<tab>Without any natural predators in the Dravanian hinterlands, the population of bifericeras introduced to the area by goblins for harvesting has increased exponentially. The residents of Idyllshire are seeking brave men and women to cull their numbers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
果しなき流れの果てで<tab>食用に養殖されていたビフェリケラスが
繁殖した結果、水質汚染の原因となっている
魔法貝ビフェリケラスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Toad Alone<tab>Poor Bero Roggo is just one of many poroggo familiars abandoned by their masters when the Sharlayan exodus took place. Bero, however, never forgot the pain of waking up alone, and has since sworn revenge on anyone who even reminds him of his former life.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
主を待つ者「孤独のベロ・ロッゴ」<tab>自らを捨て去った「ヒト」に復讐するため
元使い魔のポロッゴが動き出した
孤独のベロ・ロッゴを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: How Do You Feed a Hungry Manlike Monster<tab>A remarkably ravenous breed of opken, the oplo opken will devour upwards of a hundred fish a day to fill their seemingly bottomless bellies, moving on once an area has been gutted. Though they appear manlike, the opken are more monster than man─the end of a blade the only reason they will heed.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
魚喰いの魚人「オプロケプロン」<tab>一日に百匹単位の魚を喰らう
大食漢のオプケンが現れた
魚喰いの魚人、オプロケプロンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Out of the Woodwork<tab>Crawlers have infested Saint Mocianne's Arboretum and are transforming the entire building into a giant cocoon from which more crawlers will eventually emerge. Squash the vilekin...and don't forget to wipe your buskins on the grass.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
クロウラーの巣<tab>荒れ果てた聖モシャーヌ植物園で異常繁殖した
クロウラーが新たな繁殖場所を求めて出現した
蠢く害虫、クロウラーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Silkworm<tab>The cyclopean crawler Habetrot is a weaver most wicked, and will spin his silk about anything that moves, including his own kin. It is high time the vilekin's threads were snapped.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
糸紡ぎ巧者「ハベロット」<tab>同族すらをも粘糸で絡め取り捕食する
獰猛なクロウラーが這いずり回っている
糸紡ぎ巧者、ハベロットを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Eye in the Sky<tab>Many of the knights stationed in the Coerthas western highlands to watch the skies for Horde activity complain of a constant feeling of being watched themselves...by giant furry eyes nonetheless. Search the area for the peeping prowlers and provide them with a slightly more permanent form of “shut-eye.”<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
誰か見てるぞ！<tab>ドラゴン族の動向を監視する騎兵たちが
じっと見つめる陰湿な視線に悩まされている
不気味な監視者、ディープアイを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Dung Deal<tab>A noblewoman who recently visited the Pike and Anvil lodged a formal complaint with the Falcon's Nest garrison commander, threatening to strip him of his land and titles after stepping in a rather ripe pile of dung left by the steinbocks which graze in the area. The message is clear─either the beasts go, or he goes.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
巡礼の騎士<tab>ハルドラス像の巡礼に来た騎兵が
像の周囲を糞で穢す獣を排除しようとしている
巡礼の騎士と共に、スタインボックを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Land of the Freeze<tab>Ice sprites blown off the windswept Gorgagne Holding and into Camp Riversmeet are freezing all the outpost's drinking water. Slay the spirits and ensure thirsts stay slaked.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
凍結スリップ注意！<tab>キャンプ・リバーズミートの再建を阻む
凍結問題の原因を排除せよ
アイススプライトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dawn of the Mylodons<tab>Upland mylodons have lumbered their way atop the Black Iron Bridge to bathe in the short winter sun, and refuse to budge, impeding the progress of supply wains going to and from Falcon's Nest. Drive the beasts back so that the deliveries might recommence.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
黒鉄橋の戦い<tab>生息域を拡大させようとミロドンの群れが
ブラックアイアン・ブリッジに押し寄せてきた
橋の安全確保のため、アップランド・ミロドンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Don of the Mylodons<tab>Displeased by their violent displacement from the sunbaked stones of the Black Iron Bridge, the upland mylodons have lumbered back, this time accompanied by their great elder, Peluda.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
剛毛の白獣「ペルダ」<tab>配下の群れを排除されたことで
怒り狂ったミロドンのアルファが現れた
剛毛の白獣、ペルダを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: We Fought a Dzu<tab>Numerous are the legends that tell of Dzu-Teh─a yeti as tall as the Craving Tree and as fast as the Swiftrun River. With a temper as hot as the waters of Dragonspit and a heart as cold as rime-locked Ashpool. With hair as white as the flour once ground at Gorgagne Mills and... In other words, he must needs be slain.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ヤク喰い巨人「ズウティ」<tab>ヤクすら丸かじりにするという巨大イエティが
イシュガルドの騎兵たちの脅威となっている
ヤク喰い巨人、ズウティを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: True Convictions<tab>Ever yammering about how they seek the glory one might obtain by slaying a dragon, the moment a few archaeornis descend on their camp, the Convictors turn pleading eyes to nearby adventurers, seeking assistance in escaping the day with their lives...and to a lesser extent, their dignities.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
栄光の聖フィネア連隊<tab>聖フィネア連隊の露営地に対し
ドラゴン族の眷属が侵攻を開始した
アルケオーニスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Polar Express<tab>Food is scarce in the snow-covered north, so when Ishgardian knights bring in large quantities of rations to outfit their camps, it is only a matter of time before all manner of hungry creatures descend from the mountains looking for a bite. Drive away the beasts to keep the knights' bellies full.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
熊出没注意<tab>兵たちの食事の匂いに誘われて
ポーラーベアーが露営地にやって来た
騎兵を飢餓から救うため、ポーラーベアーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Apparent Trap<tab>While the name “yetitrap” implies that the seedkin is physically capable of actually trapping a full-grown yeti, it is highly unlikely that even a Lalafell's forearm would fit in the plant's mouth. That does not mean, however, that they should be left to roam free nipping at Lalafellin limbs.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雪男の天敵「イエティトラップ」<tab>イエティすら捕らえて捕食するという
悪名高いスリートトラップを発見した
雪男の天敵、イエティトラップを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Abominable Me<tab>On especially cold nights, yetis from the Slate Mountains will journey down to Dragonspit to find warmth in the thermal pools. On their way back, they will oft raid nearby farms, stealing livestock and the occasional child, whom they keep alive until back in their dens so they may drink the blood hot.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
獣人雪男<tab>湧き出した温泉の湯を求めて
イエティたちが我先にと移動を開始した
猛ったローン・イエティを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Requiem for a Dragon<tab>Ever since its exposure following the Calamity, the ice encasing the Dreaming Dragon of Ashpool has been slowly melting, releasing into the nearby air the fetid stench of rotting dragon flesh─a stench that is now driving local fauna into a frenzy. Slay the slavering wooly yaks and polar bears drawn to the dragon before they set their sights on you.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
臥竜島の戦い<tab>騎兵たちが魔物に襲われる事態が頻発している
臥竜島近辺にて魔物たちを駆除せよ
ウーリーヤクとポーラーベアーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Follow the Sleet<tab>The endless winter brought by the Calamity has rendered the once-lush Gorgagne Holding a frozen wasteland where naught but man-eating sleet traps thrive. But, as the saying goes, an empty wasteland is better than one teeming with deadly seedkin, so take up your swords and slice away.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
凍った花<tab>寒冷化により牧草が絶えたゴルガニュ牧草地に
耐寒性に優れた草木綱の魔物がはびこっている
氷原に咲く、スリートトラップを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sick Pack<tab>When the climate in the highlands changed, once fiercely independent wolf packs began doing the unthinkable─combining, forming super packs so as to increase chances of survival in their new harsh environment. These super packs now pose a serious threat to the knights stationed in the area, and assistance is sought in controlling their numbers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ダスクの銀狼<tab>廃砦ダスクヴィジルの周辺地域に
血に餓えたウルフの群れが跋扈している
砦再建の障害となるシルバーウルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: In Command<tab>If anything is worse than being maimed by an ice commander, it is being buried alive in an avalanche caused by an ice commander and wishing in the final moments before suffocation that you had instead been maimed by an ice commander. Rid the area of ice commanders, and alleviate the need to worry about either.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
コマンダー！<tab>クルザスに進出してきたアイスコマンダーが
地ならしを行い、崖崩れの要因となっている
迷惑千万なアイスコマンダーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: What You See Is What You Get<tab>It is said that when gazing into the eye of the Beholder, a man can see his deepest desires─those desires usually involving escape from the iron grip of the Beholder's wicked claws.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
幻惑の視線「ビホルダー」<tab>幾多の騎兵を魔眼で惑わしてきた
不気味なディープアイを排除せよ
幻惑の視線、ビホルダーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Panic Rheum<tab>A voidsent by any other name would still be as unsweet as the deceptively sweet-sounding gelato. Case in point, the rheum (though its name is not very sweet-sounding to begin with). In addition to not being very sweet, both are also very deadly, and if the first is not reason enough to cull their numbers, the second definitely is.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スノーホワイト<tab>降り積もった雪がいつまでも解けぬ
原因となっている魔物を排除せよ
ホワイトジェラートとホワイトルームを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sugar, Sugar<tab>One can tell how well fed an area's residents are by listening to the names given to everyday creatures─playful monikers such as Tartufo and White Truffle suggesting that starvation-induced delirium is causing everything to resemble food. Unable to fight on empty stomachs, the people of Coerthas seek a better-nourished hero to save them.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
人喰い氷菓「タルトゥフォ＆ホワイトトリュフ」<tab>騎兵たちから氷菓の名で呼ばれている
不気味な人喰い魔物を討伐せよ
タルトゥフォとホワイトトリュフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Unsilent Vigil<tab>Several archaeornis have flown over Lancegate and begun gathering near the Dusk Vigil. Fearing an attack by the Dravanian Horde near, the knights in the area have put a call out to adventurers requesting assistance in dispersing the flock.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
竜の眷属を討て<tab>廃砦ダスクヴィジルの周辺で
ドラゴン族の支配下にある鳥竜が集結している
竜の眷属、アルケオーニスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Pico de Gallows<tab>While swift adventurer action has left the archaeornis flock in a state of disarray, the effort may have come too late, as scouts now report the arrival of Picolaton─a terrifying creature known to lay waste to entire companies of knights without suffering more than a few ruffled feathers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
鳥竜の大王「ピコラトン」<tab>撃退されたアルケオーニスの悲鳴を聞き
群れを率いる大物の個体が現れた
鳥竜の大王、ピコラトンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Run, Riders, Run<tab>Outriders belonging to House Durendaire have been spotted fleeing from a pack of silver wolves which, despite losing over half of its number to the knights' steel, remains in pursuit, knowing the knights cannot run forever. Hurry to the outriders' aid before their legs fail them.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
氷上の狼<tab>哨戒任務中にウルフの群れに襲われた
デュランデル家の騎兵が救援を求めて来た
執拗に襲い来る、シルバーウルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: One Whiskey, One Goat, One Spear<tab>After stumbling upon a barrel of whiskey stored outside one of the Convictors' tents, Heidrun became one of the happiest mountain goats in Coerthas. Once the whiskey had disappeared, however, he transformed into one of the angriest, destroying large stocks of supplies in a futile search for another sip.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
酒浸り野獣「ヘイズルーン」<tab>迷い込んだ連隊の露営地で、偶然に酒の味を知り
以来、酒欲しさに襲撃を繰り返す山羊を退治せよ
酒浸り野獣、ヘイズルーンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: No Ifs, Ands, or Butts<tab>Newly knighted Alaimbert of the Spiked Butt cannot understand why people are always laughing behind his back, so to prove he is worthy of their respect, he seeks a battle-hardened opponent with whom he may cross steel.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
若き竜騎士「鋭槍のアランベール」<tab>竜騎士団所属の若き竜騎士が
強い訓練相手を求めている
挑戦に応え、鋭槍のアランベールを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Null and Void<tab>Summoned eons ago and then forgotten, bergthurs are voidsent trapped in a realm not their own, determined to tear their way back to the void even if it means destroying this world in the process.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ファルコンネストの脅威<tab>古の時代に召喚された妖異の子孫が
クルザス西部高地に根付き、脅威となっている
山岳の氷鬼、ベルグスルスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dishonored<tab>Ser Werner and Ser Beaudonet of the Convictors have come to an impasse regarding who dealt the killing blow to a dragon (pup) that wandered into their camp (with a broken leg). Unwilling to even agree to disagree, Ser Werner has dishonored the Convictors and must be punished.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
功績泥棒「卑怯者のウェルナー」<tab>聖フィネア連隊の兵士同士が
功績を巡って仲間割れを始めた
手柄を横取りした、卑怯者のウェルナーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: By the Horns<tab>From the day he is born, a chocobo hunter dreams of capturing an elusive bull chocobo. Fortunately, bull chocobos are abundant enough to provide all with the opportunity to fulfill this dream...whether it be yours or not.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
伝説の馬鳥「ブルチョコボ」<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師たちが挑み続ける
幻の大物チョコボを発見した
伝説の馬鳥、ブルチョコボを捕獲せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ladies First<tab>A band of chocobo hunters banished from Tailfeather for trapping only female chocobos has been spotted near the Chocobo Forest doing what they do best. See that their next banishment is from the realm of the living.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
チョコボの森の番人<tab>掟破りの無法者の猟師たちが
産卵期のメスチョコボを狩ろうとしている
無法者の猟師たちに制裁を加えろ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Run, Run Away<tab>Swift legs and sharp beaks all but ensure that chocobos can survive the dangers of the Dravanian forelands. Some creatures, however, are simply too much for the majestic cloudkin, Yowie being one such terror.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
巧妙なる狩人「ヨーウィ」<tab>数十羽のチョコボを食い物にしてきた
狩場荒らしの大食いビネガロンを排除せよ
巧妙なる狩人、ヨーウィを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Birds of a Feather<tab>It takes a feather to catch a feather, or so say the hunters of Tailfeather who use the fallen plumes of wild chocobos to fletch their arrows. A fair sum will be paid for any feathers delivered, but beware of bandersnatches lurking in the bushes!<tab>Deliver the wild chocobo feathers to the Tailfeather hunter.<tab>Feathers delivered<tab><tab>
target:
アンブロークン・アロー<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師が
壊れぬ矢を作るための材料を求めている
「ワイルドチョコボの羽根」を集めろ<tab>手に入れた「ワイルドチョコボの羽根」を
「テイルフェザーの猟師」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品したワイルドチョコボの羽根の数<tab><tab>

source: Glawackus On, Glawackus Off<tab>Glawackus─a bandersnatch so greedy it was set upon by its own pack─now wanders the forelands alone, devouring anything it can wrap its claws around...which is most often chocobo hatchlings. Hunt down the beast and slay it once and for all.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
孤高の猛獣「グラワッカス」<tab>燻り狂ったバンダースナッチが
次なる犠牲者を捜し求め、徘徊している
孤高の猛獣、グラワッカスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bear Apparent<tab>Brown bears are eating all the salmon returning upriver to spawn before they can lay their eggs. If this continues, there will be a shortage of harvestable wavekin next season. Bloody the bears' noses so that they might seek sustenance elsewhere.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
サーモン戦争<tab>猟師が大物を狙い、川辺にやって来たが
エサを求めるベアーの群れに阻まれている
漁場を確保するため、ブラウンベアーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Who's the Moss<tab>If only poor Mossy Peak had the power to attract Roegadyn maids the way he attracts feather fleas. But he doesn't, and so his only company remains scores of bloodsucking vilekin who, if not dealt with quickly, will suck Mossy Peak dry before he can arrive home.<tab><tab>Mossy Peak<tab><tab>
target:
美しく複雑なアロマ<tab>香り高い体臭のせいなのか
やたらと虫にたかられる猟師を救え
芳醇のモッシー・ピークを護り、フェザーフリーを倒せ<tab><tab>芳醇のモッシー・ピーク<tab><tab>

source: The Rite Stuff<tab>Crazed heretics who have forsaken Halone's guidance to befoul their bodies with the blood of the enemy have made a pilgrimage to Mare's Oath─to no doubt perform some horrible pagan rite. Find the mangled creatures, and send their souls to the Fury for final judgment.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
異形の巡礼者<tab>邪竜の眷属と化した異端者の一団が
巡礼のために遺跡を訪れている
ドラヴァニアン・エイビスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Dead Meat<tab>Exiled from the Gnath after losing their ties to the Onemind, the Vath must fare for themselves if they are to survive, and if that means looking to an adventurer for aid in slaying loaghtans, they are not too proud to ask.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
いかにも肉って肉<tab>「分かたれし者」のヴァスの狩人たちが
食料調達のため狩りに挑もうとしている
狩人たちと共に、ロフタンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Whole Truth<tab>A band of heretics led by the overzealous Huibairten has gathered near Tailfeather, their sights set on the lightly defended hamlet and its bounteous stores of provisions. Slay the wild-eyed men and women before their leader arrives and the assault is commenced.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
敵の敵も敵<tab>氷の巫女に反発する過激な異端者集団が
テイルフェザーの襲撃を画策している
集結した異端者たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Nothing but the Truth<tab>Huibairten is overtaken with madness upon seeing the bodies of his loyal servants strewn across the forest floor. The anger sends his tainted blood a-boiling, hastening his transformation into the beast which now looms before you. Slay the heretic before he sees Tailfeather burn.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
異端の扇動者「熱狂のウベルティアン」<tab>異端者集団を束ねる手配犯が
竜の血の力を用いて、変身を遂げた
異端の扇動者、熱狂のウベルティアンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Drone Under<tab>Ever looking to expand the Onemind, the Gnath have sent forth a small parade of drones to seek out and claim new lands. Engage the beastmen and hold the line until the enemy sounds the retreat.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
戦いを終わらせるもの<tab>領地拡大を目指すグナース族が
新たな遠征部隊を進発させようとしている
グナース族の軍勢を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: El Miacid<tab>A Vath hates three things, and two of them involve the pesky miacid. Aid the Nonmind in clearing the area of the beastkin and alleviate approximately sixty-seven percent of their worries.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
境界の川<tab>ヴァスの塚の「分かたれし者」たちが
縄張りに近づくミアキスを警戒している
移動を開始した、ミアキスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Cerf's Up<tab>Not quite a hippogryph and technically not a griffin, the hippocerf is the awkward little cousin in the lion-eagle hybrid family. Ever trying to prove their worth, they engage in reckless behavior that, while oft simply annoying, will sometimes prove deadly, especially when that behavior involves fragile dragon eggs.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
卵をめぐる竜の戦争<tab>餓えたヒッポセルフの群れが
ドラゴン族の卵を狙い隙を覗っている
フォーランド・ヒッポセルフを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Elephant in the Brume<tab>Many a wall in Ishgard's Brume still bear the scars of Svarog's numerous assaults on the city<var 1F /var>state proper, as do many a heart of those who have lost kin to the fell wyrm's flames. It is time the deeds were repaid.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲霧街の虐殺者「スヴァローグ」<tab>かつてイシュガルド都市内に侵入し
多くの人々を殺害した悪名高き飛竜が発見された
雲霧街の虐殺者、スヴァローグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Migas Touch<tab>Returning from the hunt to find half her clutch being slurped down by a party of hungry Vath has sent nanka matron Migas into a frenzy, and now she threatens to lay waste to all of Loth ast Vath. Assist the Nonmind in pacifying the pond-dweller.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
怒れる母「ミガス」<tab>ヴァスの塚のグナース族の手によって
幼生や卵を狩られ、怒り狂い報復に出た
怒れる母、ミガスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Hearing Voices<tab>Scholars claim that the voice of a dragon somehow manipulates the wind aether upon which it is carried─the aether providing the voice with added potency which, in turn, extends range and authority. Heightened vinegaroon activity in the forelands is believed to be in direct correlation with this phenomenon.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
地底の足音<tab>魔力が込められたドラゴン族の咆吼にあてられ
甲鱗綱の魔物、ビネガロンが猛り狂っている
興奮状態に陥ったビネガロンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Mourning After<tab>The half-man, half-dragon abomination Bloodbearer Robairlain has laid claim to the sacred cavern known as Mourn, slaying several of its peaceful guardians in the process. The Horde and its mindless minions cannot be allowed a foothold so near Ishgardian territories. Find this heretic and expel him from Sohm Al.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
下克上の眷属「竜人のロベルラン」<tab>強大な力によって上位のドラゴン族をねじ伏せ
モーン大岩窟を支配する竜人が現れた
下克上の眷属、竜人のロベルランを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Stamp the Yard<tab>Driven from their territory by Horde dragons, a herd of gallimimuses has begun to stampede. If allowed to reach the forelands' lower elevations, they will most certainly flatten all in their path, from newly planted crops to unsuspecting children. Head off the heated creatures and attempt to slow the rampage.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
殺しが五月蠅くやって来る<tab>邪竜配下のドラゴン族にけしかけられた
ガッリミムスの群れが押し寄せて来た
恐慌状態のガッリミムスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Come to My Arms<tab>A pack of peaceful bandersnatches have begun to clash with several thunder dragons over control of a watering hole. Use the confusion as an opportunity to slay the dragons and calm the bloody waters.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
竜虎の争い<tab>水場を巡ってバンダースナッチの群れが
果敢にもドラゴン族に挑もうとしている
この機に乗じ、ドラゴン族を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Special Tarasque Force<tab>While rare, the dragon Tarasque will occasionally descend from the Churning Mists to foul the weak minds of heretics seeking truth in the words of the enemy. This opportunity to slay the master manipulator cannot be allowed to slip through our fingers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
爆着の甲竜「タラスク」<tab>圧倒的な力によって、異端者たちの心を掴む
恐るべきドラゴン族が、雲海の上より飛来した
タラスクと、その信者たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Mint Condition<tab>To stave off the myriad vilekin that endlessly nip at the cheeks of the Rose Knights stationed in Cloudtop, several crates filled with seedlings of a natural herb repellent known as catmint were brought in to plant around the camp. Unfortunately, the odor has attracted a clowder of gaelicats who have begun destroying the containers to get at their contents.<tab><tab>Catmint remaining<tab><tab>
target:
猫まっしぐら<tab>薔薇騎兵団の糧秣の臭いに誘われて
飛猫の群れが、まっしぐらに押し寄せて来た
騎兵と共に物資を守り、ゲイラキャットを倒せ<tab><tab>薔薇騎兵団の糧秣の数<tab><tab>

source: Saved the Nests for Last<tab>The belly of a gastornis is filled with one of the most powerful corrosives known to man, allowing the massive cloudkin to digest almost anything from bones and hair, to crystal and rock. This digestive process produces toxic fumes which are released as the gastornis breathes, making them deadly neighbors...<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ガストルニスの巣破壊命令<tab>誘眠のブレスを吐くガストルニスが
キャンプ・クラウドトップの脅威となっている
ネストリング・ガストルニスの巣を壊せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: One Turned Over the Cloudkin's Nest<tab>If you believed that destroying a giant nest would not upset the giant creature who called that nest home, then Diatryma would like to have a word with you.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
鮮やかなる丸鳥「ディアトリマ」<tab>巣を壊されたことで
ガストルニスの群れの長が怒り狂っている
鮮やかなる丸鳥、ディアトリマを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Food Fight<tab>Food is scarce on the floating islets of the Sea of Clouds, so when two species descend on the same hunting grounds, chaos is bound to erupt. That chaos, however, can be a blessing in disguise by providing an opportunity to kill two birds (or more accurately one bird and one rodent-like creature) with one stone.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲海の大乱闘<tab>アバラシア雲海の限られたエサ場を巡り
魔物たちが大乱闘を演じている
ストラット・ガストルニスとパイッサを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Leech the Sky<tab>Not a soul in the realm would deny that a good leeching now and again keeps the humours clean and the body free of sickness, but pumpkin-sized leeches capable of rendering a man into a husk in a matter of moments? That is a different story altogether.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
薔薇の血を吸いたくて<tab>食料確保のため浮島釣りに挑んでいた
クラウドトップの薔薇騎兵が、魔物に襲われている
吸血生物オブデラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Anzu Trois<tab>Once anzu hatchlings reach a certain age, their mothers will begin taking them hunting so that the hatchlings can learn the art of subduing prey. Slay the birds, both young and old, to prevent the fostering of new killers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
黒い鳥<tab>渡り怪鳥アンズーの群れが
水場を求め、ヒナを伴い飛来してきた
マザーアンズーとアンズー・プレットを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Youth Must Be Severed<tab>As a display of strength, young members of the Gundu tribe will taunt their enemies using petty acts of aggression such as shouting insults or throwing feces. Those especially brave and arrogant, however, will actually physically attack, and without someone to bloody their noses, the violence can only escalate.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
若気の至り<tab>バヌバヌの氏族「グンド族」の若者が
ヒトに対する威嚇行動のため集まっている
挑発的なランレイ・グンドたちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Long Way Down<tab>The paissas are a mischievous bunch, finding amusement in cracking open Rose Knight crates and tossing their contents off Cloudtop to the ground thousands of yalms below. The worst offender─a deceptively adorable misfit named Apotamkin─has been sighted, and the order is out to show him the same fate as the crates.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不法投棄者「アポタムキン」<tab>クラウドトップの騎兵たちの持ち物を盗んでは
雲海に投げ落とす悪戯パイッサをこらしめろ
不法投棄者、アポタムキンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: This Is How We Gundu<tab>Armed warriors of the hostile Gundu tribe have gathered before Vundu Ok' Bendu and begun the ritual hooting of insults and stomping of talons which normally serve as a prelude to battle. Rather than wait for the Vanu to attack, the Rose Knights have elected to cast the first stone.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲海の戦士<tab>ブンド・オク・ベンドの偵察にきた薔薇騎兵が
グンド族に追われ、身を隠している
薔薇騎兵を逃がすため、グンドの戦士たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Come to My Window<tab>One too many puffs on the morrowmote pipe put the Zundu tribe wamourakeeper's mind so at ease that he forgot to lock the gate to the silk pens before retiring to bed. When he woke the next morning to the chaos inflicted by the escaped moths, he wondered why the morrowmotes did not provide him with visions of <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> particular future.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
素晴らしい新世界<tab>ズンド族の虫使いが、虫小屋を閉め忘れたため
糸を紡ぐために飼育していた虫たちが逃げ出した
虫害を防ぐために、ウィンドウ・ワモーラを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Obey their Thirst<tab>The Zundu tribe discovered long ago that the hearts of cloud sprites are crystals which, when shattered, expel large amounts of clean, drinkable water─a resource quite scarce on their floating islets. The problem is removing the hearts from their owners who, annoyingly enough, require them to live.<tab>Deliver the spring cores to the nat'leii Zundu.<tab>Cores delivered<tab><tab>
target:
空の上の雲<tab>ズンド族の若者が水源を求めている
周辺を浮遊するクラウド・スプライトを倒し
「湧水の核」を集めろ<tab>手に入れた「湧水の核」を
「ズンド族の若者」に
速やかに納品せよ<tab>納品した湧水の核の数<tab><tab>

source: The Fugitive<tab>A young member of the Zundu tribe, kidnapped and forced to serve as a footrest for a Vundu elder, has escaped his captors and is trying to return home. The elder, displeased that his favorite footrest has flown the coop, has gathered a small army to search every cookhouse, birdhouse, and outhouse in order to reclaim what he rightfully abducted.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
逃亡者<tab>ブンド族に囚われて奴隷として働かされていた
ズンド族の若者が助けを求めている
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FA301 /var>を護衛せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Zuns on the Run<tab>The warrior who kindly agreed to escort the former footrest back to the Zundu village has turned out to be a gaelicat's-paw of the Vundu elder who kidnapped the young Zundu. It appears that boy will require further escort if he is ever to arrive home.<tab><tab>Zundu fugitive<tab><tab>
target:
追跡者<tab>出迎えのバヌバヌ族は
逃亡奴隷を追う、ブンド族の奴隷飼いであった
ふたたび<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FA301 /var>を護衛せよ<tab><tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FA301 /var><tab><tab>

source: On Dangerous Ground<tab>After centuries of protecting the land, one groundskeeper had enough and began devouring the very stuff he was tasked with defending. Decommission the groundseater before there are no islets left in the sky.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
暴食の岩人形「グランズイーター」<tab>大地を護るべきグランズキーパーが
巨体化するため、浮島の土を食べ続けている
暴食の岩人形、グランズイーターを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Leather and Mace<tab>Tanning techniques are relatively unknown to the Vanu Vanu, making treated leather a rare commodity in the Sea of Clouds. Rather than learn to make their own, some of the tribes would instead forcefully take it from the area's new arrivals clad head to toe in the protective wear.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
補給線を断て<tab>武具の材料となる骨材や革材を手に入れるため
ブンド族の狩猟団が出陣した
ブンド族の狩人たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Hearts Like Steel, Fists Like Thunder<tab>Soldiers of the VIth Imperial Legion have engaged with the Vundu tribe. Allow the two sides to weaken each other, then sneak in and claim the heads of both.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
招かれざる客<tab>浮島に上陸した帝国軍第VI軍団所属部隊と
ブンド族の戦士たちが交戦している
この機を逃さず、両者を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bones<tab>Though average Vanu lifespans would suggest she is not a day over thirty summers, members of the Zundu claim that Vundu warrioress Oonu Vali has been collecting the bones of her victims and adding them to her feathers since the dawn of time.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
恐怖の対象「積乱のオヌバリ」<tab>積乱雲の如く荒い気性で知られる
ブンド族の女戦士長が獲物を求め動き出した
ズンド族の恐怖の対象、積乱のオヌバリを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Bismarcking Time<tab>Vundu high priest Kena Vanu has begun a forbidden rite which, if allowed to continue, will summon forth the very Lord of the Mists, Bismarck. Slay the beastman and prevent certain tragedy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲神の司祭「入道のケナバヌ」<tab>ブンド族の高位司祭が、雲神に祈りを捧げている
これを打ち倒し、ブンド族の士気を削げ
雲神の司祭、入道のケナバヌを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Let There Be Acolytes<tab>Acolytes of the temporarily dispatched Kena Vanu have sworn revenge on the featherless netherlings who silenced their master before he could finish teaching them all seventy-three mysteries of the skies.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ケナバヌの弟子たち<tab>窮地に立たされた司祭を護らんと
ケナバヌの弟子たちが現れた
ランライ・ケナバヌを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Disturbing Lack of Faith<tab>It appears Kena Vanu was not as thoroughly dispatched as originally believed, and the high priest has returned, not with the Lord of the Mists, but with a creature almost as imposing at his side. Ware the impaling talons of the dread Skvader and slay the beastman who summoned him.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
復讐の司祭「入道のケナバヌ」<tab>弟子たちが倒されたことを知り
復讐のためにケナバヌが舞い戻ってきた
ふたたび入道のケナバヌとスクヴェイダーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Guano a Mano<tab>Nothing is worse than finding yourself underneath a flock of toco tocos as they relieve themselves of their recent meals...until you realize that toco toco guano is highly corrosive and can burn your flesh down to the bone. Disperse the converging cloudkin before they carpet bomb the entire area with their fetid feces.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
絨毯爆撃<tab>トコトコの群れが、生息圏を広げようとしている
これ以上の繁殖は、フン害の拡大をもたらすだろう
騎兵団が絨毯爆撃を喰らう前に、トコトコを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Sound of Madness<tab>Vanu tribes claim that the shrill mating call of Podarge, a fearsome cloudkin who inhabits the Sea of Clouds, can drive men to madness─the most severely affected throwing themselves off islands simply to escape the terrible sound. Silence the creature before your own sanity is lost.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
狂気の歌声「ポダルゲー」<tab>音程の狂った鳴き声によって
聞く者の精神を錯乱させる怪鳥を排除せよ
狂気の歌声、ポダルゲーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: You Eat What You Aren't<tab>The diet of a griffin is believed to consist mostly of the flesh of small- to medium-sized mountain creatures such as goats and gaelicats. The hulking Akhekhu, however, will only sup on fully grown Vanu Vanu, making the cloudkin both hated and feared by the islet tribes.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雲海の狂風「アケク」<tab>数々のバヌバヌ族を捕食してきた
獰猛なはぐれグリフィンを排除せよ
雲海の狂風、アケクを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Dream, Perchance to Eat<tab>Some Vanu Vanu tribes believe that one's soul leaves the body every night to journey to the realm of dreams. It is also believed that cloudkin known as tsanahales will perch atop village huts in an attempt to devour these souls, making the creatures hated across the Sea of Clouds.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不吉な鳥は雲の彼方へ飛ぶ<tab>不快な鳴き声を発する怪鳥の群れが
狩りをするため、集団で移動を開始した
被害が出る前に、ツィナハレを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Darkscale Descendeth<tab>Vowing to see Zenith suffer no more at the ravaging claws of the Horde, Hraesvelgr has summoned the mighty Vedrfolnir to do his bidding. Join the white dragon in defending the ancient spire from Darkscale─one of Nidhogg's most fearsome generals.<tab><tab>Vedrfolnir<tab><tab>
target:
ダークスケール征討戦：白竜支援<tab>白亜の神殿を荒らす、邪竜の眷属に対抗すべく
聖竜配下の白竜ヴェズルフェルニルが動き出した
白竜を援護しつつ、闇竜ダークスケールを倒せ<tab><tab>ヴェズルフェルニル<tab><tab>

source: Darkscale Disappeareth<tab>Both body and pride wounded, Darkscale has ordered his three captains to guard his retreat from Zenith. Focus your efforts on the minions before the healing properties of the general's dragon blood see him to a full recovery.<tab><tab>Vedrfolnir<tab><tab>
target:
ダークスケール征討戦：追撃作戦<tab>不利を悟ったダークスケールは退却を始めた
白竜を援護しつつ、足止めに現れた
闇竜ダークスケールの眷属を倒せ<tab><tab>ヴェズルフェルニル<tab><tab>

source: Darkscale Devoureth<tab>Tapping into the aetherial energy of a nearby crystal deposit has filled Darkscale with newfound strength. Engage the unyielding dragon in one last battle to the death.<tab><tab>Vedrfolnir<tab><tab>
target:
ダークスケール征討戦：総力決戦<tab>クリスタルの力を使い、闇竜が真の力を解放した
白竜ヴェズルフェルニルを援護しつつ
全力を投じて、闇竜ダークスケールを倒せ<tab><tab>ヴェズルフェルニル<tab><tab>

source: Vedrfolnir Devoteth<tab>Thoroughly impressed with your valor in the slaying of Darkscale, Vedrfolnir has granted you a boon─the honor of matching strength on the field of battle with the white dragon himself.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
蒼天の白竜「ヴェズルフェルニル」<tab>白竜との共闘により、闇竜を退けた
その礼として、白竜は修行相手になってくれるという
白竜ヴェズルフェルニルに、己の力を示せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: End of the Rainbow<tab>It appears curiosity is not only suited for killing cats, but dragon pups as well. An ill-advised adventure far from his den has placed Rhei End in the face of imminent danger. Hurry to the pup in peril and see that his inquisitive nature is not the end of him.<tab><tab>Rhei End<tab><tab>
target:
白亜の宮殿防衛戦：子竜救援<tab>好奇心旺盛な聖竜の一族、子竜レイ・エンドが
闇竜ダークスケール配下の竜人エルタニンに襲撃されている
子竜レイ・エンドを護り、闇竜の眷属を倒せ<tab><tab>レイ・エンド<tab><tab>

source: Rastaban Vibration<tab>Led by Darkscale's trusted Captain Rastaban, a sizable knot of dragons has begun advancing towards Zenith. Slay Rastaban's minions and put an end to the assault before it can begin.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
白亜の宮殿防衛戦：猛竜討伐<tab>闇竜ダークスケール配下の猛竜ラスタバンが、
取り巻きを伴い、白亜の宮殿に進軍を開始した
闇竜の眷属、猛竜の取り巻きたちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Mogicide<tab>Another of Darkscale's captains has launched an assault on Zenith, but instead of focusing his attacks on the spire itself, the dragon seeks to slaughter Zenith's moogle caretakers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
白亜の宮殿防衛戦：モーグリ救援<tab>闇竜ダークスケール配下の眷属が

ただちに援護し、闇竜の眷属を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Rebel Yehl<tab>Incensed by the recent influx of free company airships into its territory, the savage cloudkin Yehl has declared a one-bird war on any and all denizens of the lower realm.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

大嘴の怪鳥、イェルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Bug's Death<tab>Several verification nodes have identified a unit of malfunctioning clockwork engineers and are requesting assistance in the deactivation of the faulty machina.<tab><tab>Verification nodes<tab><tab>
target:
バグ報告ナンバー壱九九<tab>検査システムが、バグにより暴走した
工作機械の強制停止を求めている
検査システムを護り、アラガンワーク・エンジニアを倒せ<tab><tab>検査システムの数<tab><tab>

source: The Late Escape<tab>A slither of self-aware lamiae are attempting an escape from Azys Lla. If the biologically engineered warriors were able to reach Eorzea, the realm would run red with the blood of their victims. Stop the lamiae before they can reach Helix.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
輪廻の蛇<tab>キメラ生物「ラミア」の群れが
魔大陸からの脱出を試みようとしている
地上に広まらぬよう、ラミアたちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Still Ticking<tab>Unauthorized personnel (you!) have been detected in the Alpha Quadrant and a clockwork defragmentation unit has been deployed to neutralize the threat.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
アラグ脅威のメカニズム<tab>古の試作機が侵入者を検知し、戦闘態勢に移行した
アラガンワーク・カーニフェックスと
アラガンワーク・オーバーロードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Life of Brain<tab>Thousands of years of uncontrolled reproduction and mutation have seen one chimera's cranial capacity nearly double, resulting in a creature too clever...and deadly for its own good. Slay the chimera brain, and end its line.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
狡知の魔獣「キマイラブレイン」<tab>突然変異により高い知性を獲得した
キマイラ型合成獣が、頭脳の栄養分を求めている
狡知の魔獣、キマイラブレインを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Monster Mass<tab>Ages of neglect have taken their toll on the functionality of the equipment housed in the Biomass Incubation Complex. A malfunction has caused the machines to awaken and begin the mass regeneration of empuses─hideous creatures engineered to kill.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
魔獣狩り<tab>生体培養局の培養システムが暴走し
大量のキメラ生物を増産してしまった
生まれ落ちたばかりのエンプーサを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Pet, Smart<tab>A favorite pet of Emperor Xande, the artificially cloned voidsent Muchalinda has been out of temper since the death of her master, and now believes she knows upon who she might place the blame.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
忠義の妖王「ムチャリンダ」<tab>始皇帝ザンデの偉大さにひれ伏した
人工妖異の王が、亡き主の復讐を求めている
忠義の妖王、ムチャリンダを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Root of Evil<tab>Water is a scarce resource on the corrupted islands of Azys Lla. To survive, the few plants which grow in the area must extend their roots to any sort of moisture available...even if that includes the chemically enriched incubation fluid in which chimeras are grown.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ミュータントフラワーズ<tab>キメラ生物用の培養液を吸ったことで
進化を遂げたコープスフラワーが繁茂している
ミュータントフラワーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Mystery Machine<tab>In an attempt to bypass Allagan security, the VIth Imperial Legion has off-loaded a small army of magitek vanguards L-1 from their dreadnaught and deployed them throughout the Gamma Quadrant. While their main targets are clockwork sentries, the machina could pose a deterrent for the allies of Eorzea. Deactivate the machina and cast the rubble to the lands below.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
スチールシティ<tab>帝国軍第VI軍団がアラグの兵器に対抗するため
小型化した無人魔導兵器を大量投入した
魔導ヴァンガード軽装型を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Rampant Speculation<tab>Imperial speculators are scouring the Gamma Quadrant for military technology that they may take back to Garlemald and incorporate into their armies. Stop the imperials before they can report to the <var 1A 02 /var>Gration<var 1A 01 /var>.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ロストテクノロジー<tab>アラグ文明の知識を求めて
帝国軍特殊部隊が行動を開始した
インペリアル・スペキュレーターを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Put the Knives Down<tab>When not used to tear enemies of the Empire limb from limb, adamantite claws are often employed at construction sites for digging holes, demolishing old buildings, and lifting objects. Here, they seem intent on tearing you limb from limb.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
全自動手作業<tab>魔大陸にて陣地構築作業を進める
帝国軍第VI軍団の工作機械を破壊せよ
魔導アダマンクローを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Scared Sylla<tab>Senior magitek technician Sylla mal Albinus has arrived from Garlemald to conduct his inspection of the location chosen for the construction of Castrum Solus. Act quickly, for a similar chance to apprehend the high-ranking imperial official may not present itself again.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
魔導技師長「シラ・マル・アルビヌス」<tab>陣地構築作業を妨害された
帝国軍の魔導工兵部隊が反撃に転じた
魔導技師長シラ・マル・アルビヌスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Phi Slamma Gamma East<tab>Seeking to lay claim to the area before the Eorzean Alliance, the VIth Imperial Legion has dispatched several centuries of soldiers to secure footholds in strategic locations throughout the Gamma Quadrant.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ガンマ戦線バースト：東部<tab>帝国軍第VI軍団の所属部隊が
魔大陸を制圧するため、各地に展開している
彼らの野望を阻止するため、帝国軍部隊を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Phi Slamma Gamma West<tab>Seeking to lay claim to the area before the Eorzean Alliance, the VIth Imperial Legion has dispatched several centuries of soldiers to secure footholds in strategic locations throughout the Gamma Quadrant.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ガンマ戦線バースト：西部<tab>帝国軍第VI軍団の所属部隊が
魔大陸を制圧するため、各地に展開している
彼らの野望を阻止するため、帝国軍部隊を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Phi Slamma Gamma South<tab>Seeking to lay claim to the area before the Eorzean Alliance, the VIth Imperial Legion has dispatched several centuries of soldiers to secure footholds in strategic locations throughout the Gamma Quadrant.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ガンマ戦線バースト：南部<tab>帝国軍第VI軍団の所属部隊が
魔大陸を制圧するため、各地に展開している
彼らの野望を阻止するため、帝国軍部隊を倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Yak It Up<tab>The Allagan Empire is infamous for its wanton manipulation of the gods' creations─the Meracydian brobinyak being only one of many examples. Put these pitiful creatures out of their misery and restore nature's equilibrium.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
無知性化の嵐<tab>アラグ帝国による生体改造実験の末
正気を失ったドラゴン族が徘徊している
メラシディアン・ブロビニャクを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: No Greater Goryshche<tab>Even the mighty dragons themselves were subject to the Allagan Empire's incessant tinkering with the very laws of nature─Goryshche is one such product of that imperial hubris. Aimlessly roaming the Azys Lla wastes, the multi-headed abomination silently seeks an end to five thousand years of suffering.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
人造多頭竜「ゴリシュチェ」<tab>アラグ帝国がドラゴン族をベースに合成した
対竜キメラ生物兵器が姿を現した
人造多頭竜、ゴリシュチェを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
target: <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Harvest Moon<tab>An alarum blares from some unknown source, accompanied by the following message: “Administrative node malfunction! Unit deployment error. Automatic recall failed. Removal request submitted. Authorization code 5670-2H5BB-Q90. Repeat. Administrative node malfunction...”<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
大量誤発注事件<tab>管理システムの発注ミスにより
無人兵器が大量生産されてしまった
アラガンワーク・ハーベストマンを処分せよ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Out of Sight, Out of Mind<tab>Data retrieved from tomestones discovered in the Delta Quadrant provide proof that the chimerical failure code-named Stheno was one of the reasons the quarantine block was originally constructed.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
不吉なる実験体「ステンノー」<tab>隔離実験島が造られる切っ掛けとなった
ラミア型キメラ生物が、ひっそり佇んでいる
不吉なる実験体、ステンノーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Room without Books<tab>Extensive manipulation of not only the body, but the mind, has left most of the Allagans' creations soulless horrors who only act upon instinct. The Meracydian amphiptere will simply kill without thought as to why it does so, death being the only cure to its disease.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
魂なき肉体のごとし<tab>アラグ帝国のドラゴン培養実験により
多数の魂なき存在が増産された
哀れな被造物、メラシディアン・アンフィプテレを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Curiously Strong Things<tab>While it is unclear how they were utilized in battle, it is clear from their muscular build and violent disposition that reptoids were designed for one purpose, and one purpose only─killing.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ハイアラガンユーザー<tab>システムの管理を離れて暴れ回る
元アラグ帝国軍の四脚型キメラ兵を排除せよ
レプトイドを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Do Spinners Dream of Electric Rooks<tab>Severed communication with spinner-rooks under its administrative control has prompted the emergence of the spinner-rick to assess the problem. Destroy the node and deal a blow to the quadrant's rook activity.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
夢見る無人機「リックスピナー」<tab>スピナー型無人機「ルークスナッパー」を管制する
上位階級の指令機が姿を現した
夢見る無人機、リックスピナーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Long Live the Coeurl<tab>The queen of the coeurls has declared war on Tailfeather and leads an assault on the settlement and its inhabitants. Confront Her Majesty and deliver the kiss of regicide.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
雷獣の女王「クァールレギナ」<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師たちが
狩場を荒らす魔獣の群れに挑んでいる
ロイヤルクァールを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Coeurls Chase Boys<tab>It appears Coeurlregina's first attack on Tailfeather was naught more than a calculated feint to gauge the collective strength of those defending the hamlet. Now privy to the settlement's weaknesses, she returns with her army's true strength.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
逆襲の女王「クァールレギナ」<tab>一度は退いた雷獣の女王が
体勢を立て直し、復讐のために再来した
逆襲の女王、クァールレギナを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Coeurls Chase Boys<tab>It appears Coeurlregina's first attack on Tailfeather was naught more than a calculated feint to gauge the collective strength of those defending the hamlet. Now privy to the settlement's weaknesses, she returns with her army's true strength.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sphenopalatine Ganglioneuralgia<tab>The change in climate experienced by Coerthas after the fall of Dalamud has done more than freeze rivers and prevent the growth of foliage─it has made the region more hospitable for a myriad of terrible creatures normally only found dwelling atop the highest of mountains─creatures that have proven naught but headaches for the residents of the western highlands.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
アイスクリーム頭痛<tab>クルザス西部高地の寒冷化を加速させる
魔物の存在が、住民の頭痛の種となっている
アイススプライトとソルベを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: A Stihi Situation<tab>There are very few dragons the Convictors do not dream of slaying─the cold and calculating Stihi being no exception. The knights, however, while skilled at dreaming, have been less than successful at actually subduing the creature...<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
冷酷なる氷竜「スティヒ」<tab>聖フィネア連隊の騎兵たちが狙ってやまない
大物のドラゴン族が、西部高地に飛来した
冷酷なる氷竜、スティヒを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Ware the Maiden Fair<tab>Once a beautiful young Elezen with skin like snow and hair like an autumn sun, the dragon maiden was driven to sip the blood of the Horde after being set upon by a pair of highborn knights (who were subsequently tried and hung for their crimes). Since then, she has grown into one of the most ruthless of all wyrm-blooded heretics, attacking even innocent children. Deliver the maiden from this world and give her soul peace once again.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
変貌せし乙女「ドラゴンメイデン」<tab>竜の血を飲み干して変貌を遂げた
大物異端者が、不浄の集落にて発見された
変貌せし乙女、ドラゴンメイデンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Recurring Bugs<tab>A swarm of mechanical monstrosities is wreaking havoc on the environs of Thanalan. Stand together with the wandering minstrel, and eradicate this skittering threat.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
バグフィックス<tab>機械仕掛けの魔物が大量発生し
エオルゼアの土地を、侵食し始めている
異邦の詩人と共に、バグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Recurring Bugs<tab>A swarm of mechanical monstrosities is wreaking havoc on the environs of Thanalan. Stand together with the wandering minstrel, and eradicate this skittering threat.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

異邦の詩人と共に、バグを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Sarong Song<tab>Faires attract all sorts, and one Mamool Ja has been so incensed by the sights and sounds that he insists on showing the dance of his people, which would make even the most ribald pirate blush. Drive the overeager Mamool Ja away and protect the sensibilities of the beach's faire-goers. <tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「良俗の守護者」<tab>卑猥な踊りを紅蓮祭で披露しようと
マムージャ族の傭兵がやって来た
美男のブガージャを退け、風紀を守れ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Belle of the Beach<tab>Pirates often spend moons surrounded by nothing but frigid seawater, and the appearance of this lovely courtesan has set their hearts aflame with passion. Quell the surging tide of unwanted attention so she can enjoy her vacation in peace.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「一夏の熱狂」<tab>常夏の踊り娘の扇情的な色香が
海賊たちの心に火をつけてしまった
熱狂する海賊たちを鎮めろ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Sparking Up the Wrong Beach<tab>A group of pirates have decided to celebrate their own way by bringing a cart filled with fireworks of suspect quality to the beach. Drive them away before their explosives harm any innocent faire-goers. <tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「危険な火遊び」<tab>危険なお手製花火を持ち込み
紅蓮祭を妨害しようとする海賊を退けろ
不作法な海賊たちを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: It Came from Beneath the Deep<tab>Certain beasts, when properly trained, can provide endless entertainment to spectators, but when they start running amok─as this one has─they must needs be put down. Slay the trained Thing from the Deep before it harms any innocent onlookers.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「海獣の調教師」<tab>紅蓮祭の見世物として用意された海獣が
獣牧士を振り払い、暴れ始めた
トレインド・モーガウルを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Life's a Beach<tab>Two faire-goers wishing to enjoy the fireworks in peace are being accosted by a group of insistent pirates. Teach the pirates to respect the wishes of others, and be prepared if they decide not to listen.<tab><tab>Youths<tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「軟派者の末路」<tab>紅蓮祭を楽しむために訪れた少女たちが

少女を守り、海賊たちを撃退せよ<tab><tab>少女の数<tab><tab>

source: Feeling Groggy<tab>Pirates wishing to keep their own festivities going have brought a supply of liquor, causing a scene and littering the beach with bottles. target:

source: The Way of the Samurai<tab>Iroha is surprised to find that the voidsent near Haukke Manor are reminiscent of demons from an old story she knows well. Join her in battle and help her to defeat the fiends.<tab><tab>Iroha<tab><tab>
target:

source: Serket Breaker<tab>While investigating rumors of a sinister creature, Iroha finds herself face-to-face with Serket, a fearsome beast of legend. Join forces with Iroha and see if the monstrosity lives up to its reputation.<tab><tab>Iroha<tab><tab>
target:

source: The Key to Amatsu: Kyori<tab>With her memories restored, the time has come for Iroha to wield Amatsu: Kyori in battle. Help her to defeat the dread dragon and its voidsent minion that she might harness the power within.<tab><tab>Iroha<tab><tab>
target:

source: Eggstract and Eggspedite<tab>Seeking to recapture a lucid dream she had, Jihli Aliapoh has hidden Archon eggs throughout the quarter and employed her most restless spriggan to oversee a frivolous hunt. source: In Deep Water<tab>Bombards have begun creeping ashore and must be prevented from moving any further inland. While the Go Go Posing Rangers─heroes tasked with ridding the realm of the Bombard King and his minions─see to some last-minute preparations, their allies must rise to the occasion. Beat back the fiends with the waters of an elbst and wait for the Rangers to arrive.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「襲来 ボンバード！」<tab>大炎獣配下のボンバードたちが襲来した！
「ＡＢＵ海獣隊員」に話してエルブストに乗り
「放水」によってミニボンバードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Trial by Fire<tab>The Go Go Posing Rangers have arrived but there is no end to the battalion of burgeoning Bombards summoned by their king and for every one of the flaming voidsent extinguished, another pops up in its place. Keep the Rangers out of harm's way by blasting the tiny fiends with elbst water.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
紅蓮祭「登場 火消しの戦士！」<tab>大炎獣を倒すため、火消しの戦士が登場した！
「ＡＢＵ海獣隊員」に話してエルブストに乗り
「放水」によって周囲のミニボンバードを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Excitable Boys<tab>Aether emitted by unstable elemental crystals is sending even the most docile of creatures into uncontrollable fits of madness. The condition appears to be irreversible, with a swift end the only means of granting these poor souls mercy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
放属性シャードの悪影響<tab>放属性シャードが放つ属性の力により
周囲生物が興奮状態に陥ることがある
荒ぶるキラーアントを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Mad Ventures in Retainer-sitting<tab>Not content with the paltry pickings his retainer was retrieving from ventures into the Black Shroud, a well-to-do noble recently ordered his humble hireling to the Diadem, forbidding the retainer's return until “treasure worthy of a king” was discovered. All the poor soul discovered, however, was a den of starving sky creatures, and now requires aid in escape.<tab><tab>Resolute retainer<tab><tab>
target:

生真面目なリテイナーを守れ<tab><tab>生真面目なリテイナー<tab><tab>

source: Prepare for Gory<tab>Drawn to the Diadem by the islands' extreme concentrations of ambient aether, the carnivorous kerkes strikes fear into all who lay eyes upon it─the kerkes, whose wingspan is so large, its feathers blot out the sun. So prepare to fight in the shade.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

獰猛なる怪鳥、ケルケスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Secret of the Lost Legend<tab>Responding to the cries of her child, a mother brachiosaur has launched a merciless attack on a band of adventurers who entered the Diadem looking to capture a baby brachiosaur and return with it to Ishgard where they would auction it to the highest bidder. <tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

親獣に見つかって、逆襲に遭っている
星呼の古代獣、ブラキオレイドスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Slaughter of the Lost Legend<tab>From out of the morning mist emerge harmless baby brachiosaurs─gentle, well-tempered, kind...yet, allowed to mature to full size and these innocent infants <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> claim the lives of countless. How exactly that might happen remains to be seen, but orders are orders.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
恐竜伝説ベイビー<tab>霧に紛れてブラキオレイドスの幼獣が現れた
成長すれば探索の大きな脅威となるだろう
ブラキオレイドス・ベイビーを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Embrace of the Serpent<tab>Once again, a band of wide-eyed adventurers have bitten off slightly more than they can chew by attempting to capture a basilosaurus─a silver-scaled serpent that can grow to over two score fulms in length from fiery forked tongue to tail.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
銀鱗の雲海蛇「バシロサウルス」<tab>冒険者たちの一団が
大物を狙うため、支援を求めている
銀鱗の雲海蛇、バシロサウルスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: The Pelican Grief<tab>To subdue their prey, crown pelicans expel from their beaks a fine mist containing a powerful toxin capable of lithifying flesh. The problem is, much of this discharge is carried off by the wind before striking the intended victim, to eventually land on innocent bystanders living in the lands below.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
石の夜風<tab>石化ブレスを見境なく吐き出し
夜風に乗せて散布する害鳥を駆除せよ
はた迷惑なクラウンペリカンを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Crawllateral Damage<tab>Scholars have determined that cloud crawlers are able to grow to sizes far exceeding that of their terra firma cousins in part due to killer ants which, in their pursuit of the sweet nectar excreted from the crawlers' pores, end up serving as a defense against predators.<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: I Can Wring a Rainbow<tab>Countless sky pirates claim that during their travels through the Sea of Clouds, they have, at one time or another, witnessed a massive bird attempting to devour a rainbow from the very heavens. Countless sky pirates also claim that they've slain sanuwas with their bare hands, bedded a thousand trollops, and downed entire barrels of rum in a single sitting.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

虹食い鳥、レインボーブライトを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Excitable Boys<tab>Aether emitted by unstable elemental crystals is sending even the most docile of creatures into uncontrollable fits of madness. The condition appears to be irreversible, with a swift end the only means of granting these poor souls mercy.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
放属性シャードの悪影響<tab>放属性シャードが放つ属性の力により
周辺生物が興奮状態に陥ることがある
荒ぶるディアデム・マーリドを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: How I Met Your Marid<tab>Marids are not known for being nocturnal creatures...yet one of the largest ever observed─Iriz Ima─prefers to feed under cover of night. Its eyes, however, are not suited for seeing in the dark, meaning these evening strolls oft end in the untimely flattening of countless animals, minerals, and Lalafells.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
夢遊の長老「イリズイマ」<tab>寝付きの悪いマーリドの長老が
夜な夜な徘徊し、暴れ回っている
夢遊の長老、イリズイマを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Root of the Problem<tab>A scavenger, the Bariaua feeds solely on carrion, setting down its roots into corpses and draining them of their remaining humours. What makes this voracious seedkin different is that when hungry, it will not wait to come across a fallen creature, opting rather to slay its own prey in the most violent of fashions.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
死に花を咲かせよ<tab>屍肉に根を突き刺し養分をすする
妖花が新たな死体を作ろうとしている
大輪の妖花、バリアウアを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Nice Pirates<tab>A gods-fearing, mother-loving, goodly sky pirate has fallen from the rigging of his crew's airship. While fate deemed it not his time, and saw him land safely upon a tuft of crownbrush, fortune was not as impressed and made certain that tuft was located right in the middle of one of the Diadem's most deadly isles. Needless to say, the plucky picaroon might require some assistance.<tab><tab>Stranded sky pirate<tab><tab>
target:
ある空賊の受難<tab>ディアデム諸島に意図せず漂着した
空賊が周辺生物に襲われている
遭難した空賊を守れ<tab><tab>遭難した空賊<tab><tab>

source: Pretty Flies<tab>Jewel flies earn their name from the bright, ruby-like color of their abdomens─a hue achieved by filling those translucent bellies with the blood of any creature luckless enough to cross the vilekin's path.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
虫沸きぬ<tab>吸血性のおぞましき百蟲綱の魔物が
いっせいに孵化してしまったようだ
大量発生した、ジュエルフライを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Late-night Snack<tab>A band of bloodthirsty gigantopithecus have woken from their simian slumber to feed on the sleepy-eyed denizens of the Diadem, and only the bravest of adventurers can provide them with the rude awakening they so deserve.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
闇夜のギガントピテクス<tab>ギガントピテクスの群れが
闇夜に紛れて狩りを行うために現れた
獰猛なる肉食獣、ギガントピテクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Late-night Snack<tab>A band of bloodthirsty gigantopithecus have woken from their simian slumber to feed on the sleepy-eyed denizens of the Diadem, and only the bravest of adventurers can provide them with the rude awakening they so deserve.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:

獰猛なる肉食獣、ギガントピテクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Any Which Way<tab>Not all gigantopithecus will hunt in large packs, some choosing to take to the starlit isles of the Diadem in bands of two or three. The clydopithecus (or “clydes”) are one such species, but do not let their adorable name fool you. These beasts are natural-born killers who would tear the heart out of their own mother's breast and gnaw at its sinewy flesh while the life slowly faded from her eyes...if most had not already done so.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
ダーティファイター<tab>少数の群れで巧みな連携を行い
人を狩る特殊なギガントピテクスが発見された
薄汚い捕食者、クライドピテクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Who'll Stop the Sovereign<tab>Witnessing the wanton slaughter of his entire tribe at the hands of bloodthirsty adventurers has driven the ufiti sovereign into a rage only the sweet ring of cold steel can contain. Send His Royal Excellence to his subjects' side, so that he may rule them from the afterlife.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
復讐の猿人王「キングウフィティ」<tab>冒険者たちに乱獲されたウフィティの王が
死した一族の怨みを晴らすため現れた
復讐の猿人王、キングウフィティを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Hard of Heren<tab>Having lived for a thousand years encountering neither Lalafell nor Hyur, the Diadem's herensugues no longer fear mankind and his weapons of war. In their ignorance have they grown bold, leading to many attacks on newly arrived explorers to the islands. It is time they are reintroduced to the pain that kept their ancestors at bay.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
失われた雲海<tab>探索中に大型肉食古代獣に遭遇した
冒険者をも獲物とする貪欲の暴君
エレンスゲを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>

source: Battle Toads<tab>The relatively small size of each islet in the Diadem can make foraging quite a challenge for the region's wingless inhabitants. It takes the arrival of but a single welkinix, however, to render that challenge an impossibility. Slay the hungry toads before they see the rest of the fauna starve.<tab><tab><tab><tab>
target:
食べる前に殺す<tab>ディアデム諸島の貴重な食料を
片端から食らう大蛙が問題になっている
暴飲暴食を繰り返す、ウェルキニクスを倒せ<tab><tab><tab><tab>
